The area is under construction at the moment (certainly not the hotel’s fault) and while there is a bus stop nearby, there are no MRT stations within short walking distance. I also find that taxis had a hard time finding the place — overall, the location is inconvenient if you’re trying to do a lot of exploring/sightseeing. The room was spotless, although the decor is a bit old/dated compared to other Singapore hotels that I stayed in. The hotel has lots of decent snack and food options although they’re on the pricey side. The pool looked very nice, although I didn’t use it. The free airport shuttle is a good convenience. The front desk/concierge staff were great — friendly, helpful and accommodating. No issues with check in or check out and they answered all of our questions quickly. My only issue was with the housekeeping staff — because of the 12-hour time difference, I was fighting jet lag and would start my days rather late — around 3pm. Despite the do not disturb sign on my door, housekeeping would come by and ring the bell/knock on my door every 30-40 minutes, asking when I was leaving the room so they could clean. I understand that they have a job to do and definitely appreciate their eagerness to keep my room clean BUT, it was very frustrating to be awaken multiple times on each day of my stay to fight with housekeeping when I specifically put the do no disturb sign on my door. I did not appreciate feeling like I was being rushed out of my room each day. This isn’t a bad hotel for a one or two-night stay. The staff are great, the hotel is decent. But it certainly wouldn’t be my top choice for a longer stay in Singapore.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located away from the bustling city, yet it is near some of the most charming place singapore can offer. The parking is a little confusing, as it share the same carpark with the shopping center, but easily accessible to the hotel though. the lobby is huge, but the room is just normal singapore sized hotel, which we can't complain. The check in staff is helpful, courteous and was fast. all done in 5 mins.It is walking distance to the big shopping mall opposite the hotel, just cross the road by traffic light and you can find ALL sorts of food around.BUT the hidden gem is walking to the back of the hotel, look up KATONG ROAD on google map, and you will see lots of local delights and pubs and western, try katong laksa and nasi lemak, then the juicy steak, and look for the famous bak kut teh (pork rib soup) and there's awfully chocolate, and also local delicacy, plus a new ice cream place that seemed to be always long queue. All thes food will not break the bank, as they are located at not too pricey place, they offer good price.Walking further towards the sea, you get to enjoy the seaside (try not to swim, a little poluted but if you are adventurous...) rent a bicycle, or if a family of 4, rent a quadcycle and have some family fun, great seafood place at night but expensive, but I promise you the CRAB is HUGE if you ordered the right stuff. Must try singapore chilli crab with bread. And lastly, satay and beer to down the taste.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We always stay in this hotel if come to singapore, shuttle bus to/from changi airport is very helpfull to reach this hotel. Near shopping center parkway parade and katong mall. Room is big and clean, executive lounge is good, staff is friendly and helpfull , always fell welcome when back to stay in grand mercure roxy
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great second stay at this hotel having stayed once previously in 2018. We booked an ocean facing room on a high floor. On checking in we were assigned a room on the 14th floor which was perfect. The rooms here are great. The Wi-Fi is also great. We requested a second bed for our young son and it arrived within 5 minutes of getting into our room. The same goes for our bags which were bought up almost immediately.The free airport shuttle is awesome. We followed the instructions provided and found the transport desk at the airport where we booked onto the next shuttle. Returning to the airport at the end of our trip was just as easy, we just booked with the concierge staff after checking out.The only negative comment is regarding the cafe as the price for a takeaway coffee was different on the two occasions I ordered. There is a coffee and danish deal which was charged at more than the advertised price (maybe tax gets added on top of the advertised price?) and when ordering just a coffee I was charged around $7.50. For the remainder of the trip I got coffee at the mall across the road ($1.60).This small issue aside we were extremely happy with our stay and will stay again when next in Singapore.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed overnight on Easter weekend for a stopover between flights. There is a free airport shuttle but on arrival into Changi we opted for a cab as it was easier after a day of travelling. It was SGD $20 from terminal 1 and took less than half an hour. Arriving early evening the lobby was relatively quiet but check-in took a little longer than usual. As we booked using points Le Club upgrades were not offered. The room on the 14th floor was modern and a good size with a view out to the strait of Singapore. The bathroom was a little dated and the shower over the bath was horrible. I’d rather forgo a bath for a separate shower but this seems to be standard in Singapore hotels of this age. The air conditioning was adequate but very noisy. The Le Club welcome gift was a fruit platter. We ate at the bistro next to the pool which was a nice setting, somewhat spoiled by screaming children in the pool but I guess that’s to be expected. Service and food were both good. The gym is open 24 hours and is well equipped with modern cardio machines and plenty of weights. Rather unusually the room, mini bar and gym all lacked bottled water. The pool is open 6am - 10pm. Getting in an early swim before flying was fantastic. On departure we caught the free shuttle to Changi which departed right on time and wasn’t busy at 7:30am on a Saturday. Overall the Mercure Roxy was better than expected and I’d probably stay again on a stopover.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had not been here for a few years and were surprised by how much development has taken place over that time. there is now plenty of restaurants and shopping not too far from the Roxy. The welcome from the duty manager was very friendly.We only stayed one night this time and on eating regretted not haven slated for our return to Singapore in two weeks time. as it is a little old and well away from the CBD you get good value in aspire terms for this hotel. It is an excellent option for an airport hotel as it is only 15 minutes or less away and free hourly shuttle. There is also a shuttle to the nearby mrt for easy access to the more touristy areas of Singapore.Good rooms can be had for well less than 200$ a night.e were upgraded to a suite overlooking the sea. It is older style but the bed was excellent, the bathroom very good, very good big Tv, and plenty of room. We had a very good meal at their Chinese restaurant. The executive lounge on the 17 floor is functional more than comfortable. Drinks from 6:00 to 8:00 are limited in selection and the canapés just a little better than ok but as part of the package we enjoyed a cold beer and drinkable red wine. Th breakfast in the lounge was not so good, little selection. We would go to the main restaurant for breakfast next time.The pool for the price paid is very good, large enough to swim a few laps in and also with plenty of sun lounges. The bar is small but nice to have a drink by the pool.Overall, if we are after value for money in Singapore, we will return.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Reasonable sized room, hard to adjust ac, tired room lacking maintenance, eg loose electrical sockets and in need of dusting. Poor lighting for ladies applying make up.Good shopping centre across the road, but very difficult to get to MRT (underground). Flight left at 11.45pm but last free shuttle left at 7.30 so got to airport 2 hrs too early.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just across parkway parade shipping centre which has everything under one roof.The bed was comfortable, we had a great time at the pool. Staff were lovely and helpful, a free shuttle service is available hourly to the airport.Will definitely return.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was put up here by AirFrance when my flight from Singapore was delayed. It’s a satisfactory hotel for something not too far from the airport on a stopover. I was surprised to find a smartphone called a Handyphone sitting on a charger on the desk facing my bed. Apparently it’s a device to help steer consumers to restaurants, bars, and activities in Singapore. Sort of a local TripAdvisor, but on its own hardware that looks like a converted Samsung Galaxy(?). The problem is that because it’s on a smartphone platform, it’s equipped with a camera and a microphone. Frankly I don’t want to stay in a hotel room with someone else potentially having access to a camera and microphone, even though I’m sure they would say it’s completely innocuous. I put it into the room safe. I would have given this hotel 1 star because of this issue, but the staff were so friendly and professional that would be unfair. So if you decide to stay here, remember to stuff the Handyphone in the safe to avoid any potential privacy issues.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything in Singapore works so well. This goes for the Mercure Roxy experience as well. From the shuttle to the airport through to check in and room service. Don't miss the magnificent buffet breakfast!Not the cheapest stay but certainly worth the extra.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a couple of nights, hotel is located not far from the airport, upon arrival the reception area was very large and lovely, they have a cafe/shop in there to purchase a variety of food and drinks, check in was easy and staff pleasant, room was nice and clean with everything you could require including nice touches such as a fridge and bottled water each day even though you can drink the tap water in Singapore. The pool area was nice and the bar/restaurant near to it, they offer a good priced happy hour on drinks (5pm-7pm) staff were lovely here. Across the road from the hotel is a large shopping complex and they have chained food outlets such as kfc etc but we found another area by the hotel which had better restaurants and bars, if you leave the hotel and turn right, walk straight and then right again and along the main road you will be spoilt for choice for eateries, including an area called Katong Square which has two great bars/restaurants, highly recommend. We opted to use a taxi into the centre of Singapore and it was only 8 HKD around £6, the taxis are clean, safe, air conditioned and the drivers very knowledgeable and friendly, return taxis are also easy to locate, for this cost it’s much better than battling the public transport until the new metro line is established. Concierge also very helpful at the hotel and kindly rang our tour booking to confirm pick up times etc. Highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have done this stop over from Australia a number of times now in different hotels. We like this area close to East Coast park good for a walk or bike hire. A few eating places there for day or evening. Plenty of good shopping, restaurants and historically interesting.If you are seeking nighttime entertainment like Clarke quay probably not the place to stay but public transport is really good and cheap. This hotel will be even better soon as a new underground station being built just across the road.Rooms were a better size than others in Singapore clean with good amenities 4 food venues on site all good except buffet thought was overpriced and not an enjoyable experience. Very nice pool area.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The main adventage of this hotel is relatively short distance from the Changi airport and free bus shuttle, they offer. The bus operates regularly every hour and the driver is kind and helpful.The rooms are furnished as standard, the lobby looks rather not friendly, although the staff makes efforts to check-in and out the guests quickly and smoothly.The breakfast is very everage and seems to be too expensive.There are some oportunities for good dinning around.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel has it all, as we continue to confirm. This was our 8th stay here and we've come to know the run of everything fairly well. The food is really great from Wave Bar, Breez Bar and Feast @ East; the wifi is fast and free; location is so convenient to everything, with bus stop right outside - and soon to have an MRT as well. Many of the staff remembered us from our last stay 3 years ago, Eddie and the team at Breez Bar and several staff at Feast @ East, especially. Mr Robert Tan was exceptional in his level of service - especially on the occasion of my husband's birthday. Even concierge staff remembered us. Best of all and a huge surprise was the provision of the Handy Android phone for use by guests during their stay. On fast 4G, free data included, with Facebook, Instagram, Google already pre-installed it was so easy to record excursions without hassle of getting a Singapore SIM card. A little tricky getting the photos off, though, as most cloud based storage accounts require an SMS verification and if one doesn't have access to own phone to receive, access is not allowed. There are ways and means and thanks to WeTransfer I managed to email them to myself. Could I suggest a cable be provided so that the phone can plug into a laptop and download to photos directly. Or perhaps suggestion some other means of saving them.Only home for 2 weeks and already saving for our next visit!!Thankyou to everyone at Grand Mercure Roxy - you are all awesome!
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 28 - 31 March and my experience with Mercure Roxy have been pretty consistent throughout the years.It's a nice hotel with a big room. Being a member I get auto upgrade. The price is good, service never fails me and they provide free local newspaper delivered to your door which I personally like (not all hotels do this).As I know they provide coin operated laundry, it saves me from bringing too many clothes. It costs $7 each for washing and drying and coins can be exchanged at reception.Plenty of good foods around if you don't opt for their breakfast. It has swimming pool and gym which I don't get to enjoyed. Comes with free wi-fi (and fast too) AND a mobile phone that you can use to make international phone call for free (to many destinations) and I believe it has free data allowance as well which you can bring around when exploring Singapore.Never have any problem when asking for late check out. One comment though, the room that I stayed has a slight noise when the fan is turned to medium. Will be staying there again soon in two weeks time.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We break our journey overnight between London and Australia by a stay at the Grand Mercure Roxy and always find the staff there to be most helpful and attentive. The hotel also runs an hourly shuttle bus to/from the airport which is most helpful.
hotelName:
6    Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The check in n staff are lovely- easy to get around by foot or taxi- Food exchange staff very lovely n friendly- today Dino at breakfast time helped us to book a Grab and even offered to book one back from universal studios- very nice of him didn’t have to do this at allFront line staff are friendly n helpful 10/10
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: During check-in I was led to the privilege lounge for exclusive check-in for Accor Platinum members. The staff there was eager to help in any way.Room is decently spacious for the price of such a room in Singapore. It was clean and well maintained in all areas.Happy hour at the lounge was pleasant and featured a fair selection of food and drinks.Gym is 24 hours and could do with some instructions for guests to use due to not having any staff there at all, or maybe a button to press to call for a staff to refill on towels or otherwise.Breakfast was frantic as the 2nd floor restaurant was full and people were queuing outside (at least 10 people in queue). The 1st floor restaurants were also all full. Thankfully the lounge also has a good spread for breakfast and could satisfy our hunger. Novotel and Mercure should reconsider the breakfast policy to avoid leaving a bad impression to its guests right early in the morning.The free shuttle operated to Orchard is useful for going to shopping.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was newly constructed and interior of the hotel was considered posh and upmarket. There is a nice big swim pool, good size gym, good variety of breakfast buffet spread, greenery garden and free complimentary shuttle bus services every 30mins to and fro from the main shopping orchard road district. Most importantly, the hotel room rates are very affordable and its value for money!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Swift check in, we requested and got our baby cots and bath tub quickly and had a great stay. Good breakfast for the family. The rooms are reasonably big, sufficient for two baby cots. Pool is fun for the kids.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice place, great location, nice pool, nice hotel with very professional service from reception, from breakfast place, lounge as well as housekeeping. Recommad this place if you want to visit Singapore
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a short stopover in singapore. Arrived late at night around 11pm and check in process was smooth and fast. The room is adequate size and nicely decorated since its new. Shower pressure is good. Overall the room is good. Location is not too good need quite a walk but they provided free shuttle to galleria orchard next to royal plaza on scott which is quite good. Breakfast is good enough. Overall stay was nice and pleasant
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are very grateful to Ryan Tan, assistant director of event sales, and his banquet staff (Jeffrey yong) for helping us plan and liaise with us for our wedding. Ryan is very attentive, patient and responsive to all our queries leading up to our wedding. He provides excellent service and help, responsive even at nights to reply to our queries giving us a lot assurance as we were anxious and not sure what to expect. From the first meeting to the food tasting, and up till the actual wedding day.He came down personally during the actual wedding day to make sure everything is going as planned. He also ensure the food for the cocktail refreshment was nicely plated beautifully to serve to my guests. We thank Novotel on Stevens, Ryan Tan for the wonderful experience. We greatly recommend Novotel on Stevens for the choice of stay or Wedding celebration!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Each employee provided a great consistent service starting from the bellman, front service executives to the F&B crew; delivering the service standard for guests. I loved everything about the hotel; the location, accessibility, guest services provided, F&B, room, infinity pool. I really enjoyed my stay here and looking forward to future bookings. Will recommend travellers to book with Novotel@Orchard :)
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved the hotel. A lot of places nearby to dine, Papparich is just steps away from the main entrance. The room ,a bit small, but cozy and the beddings are very comfortable. Also the hotel provides free shuttle to Orchard Road every 30 minutes , which is convenient for guests. Would definitely come back here on my next trip to Singapore .
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated in a quiet, mainly residential area with a free shuttle bus to Orchard Road departing regularly throughout the day and evening. It stops at T Galleria a 5 minute walk to Orchard Road and Orchard MRT. Rooms are tastefully decorated, bed is luxurious and the bathroom has a large separate shower ad toilet. Service was excellent in all aspects of the hotel. There is a range of restaurants in the hotel and the adjoining Mercure Hotel complex, as well as those in the hotel itself. Three pools - one infinity and kids pool with access from the restaurant and a separate lap pool. A well equipped gym room is situated near the lap pool. Great value - will definitely stay again.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a club room at this hotel and were not disappointed. We were a little unsure about location however it is perfect. The hotel is very close to the main Orchard Road shopping area however they also offer a regular free shuttle service which was fantastic. There was also very good cheap public transport at the front of the hotel. We had a fantastic stay.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent stay - Infinity pool was a great feature and often had the entire pool to ourselves. Room was a good size, breakfast was enjoyable and staff at the restaurant were very attentive. Hotel provided free shuttle bus to and from Orchard Road which was very convenient as this is about 15 minute walk otherwise. Staff were very friendly and accommodated for when we wanted late check out. Some improvements:Shower in room had small flies which we could not get rid of. This was reported and we were able to swap to another room with no problem. When we checked in, member of staff was learning and some additional details that they could have mentioned were where the breakfast was located, where the lifts are located (we ended up going to the carpark) and information about the shuttle bus (we had seen this online so already knew but did not know the times).
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I frequent novotel Stevens to maintain my accor plus platinum status. Firstly i would like to say that this hotel really gives recognition to your loyalty status. Room upgrades, early check in and late check out are always granted. The welcome, attention and willingness to please and make customers happy is possibly the best ever example of customer service I have ever experienced. Mr Ruben and his team were informative and helpfull with all my questions and needs. Pre dawn meal 'sahur' was available from 430am to 630am during the month of Ramadan. A wide spread of food was available. A thoughtful gesture for all Muslim guest during this month. Novotel stevens sets the standards high for other accor establishments to follow!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can say that Novotel Singapore On Stevens is one of the best Novotels in South Asia Area. (I am a Gold Members of Le Accorhotels)This was my first time to stay at this hotel.I had worried a little bit for this hotel, but every thing was perfect for room, facilities, foods, amenities, etc. Especially, all staffs are very kind and professional.I stayed at Premier room.I would like to recommend this Premier room especially for business travelers.Actually, the room is a little bit small, but there is no problem for business travelers or couples because the room structure is very well arranged.For meals, I tried the breakfast buffet & A la Carte at Food Exchange and the evening cocktails&canapes at Premier Lounge. The food was very nice and delicious.The infinity pool is also good and enjoyable.I can recommend this hotel to my partners and my friends.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect hotel for a family visit to Singapore. Very well set rooms and very comfortable bed. Restaurants near the hotel.Complimentary shuttle service to orchard road.Check in and check out was swift. Good staff.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My children and I stayed in Novotel Singapore on Stevens for a few days only, but our stay was really enjoyable. From the first step when we entered the lobby, we felt very welcome. The room is very nice and clean, very comfortable. The food was awesome, lots of variety of Asian and European food, and many choices of food for children too. Oh, one thing that we love the most though, the friendliness of the staffs. They are also very polite and helpful. We will definitively will stay there again when we go to Singapore.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Modern room with clean new furnishing. Room big enough and comfortable for 2 adults. Definitely much bigger than Mercure hotel just next door (which is also new and modern). If you dun mind spending a little more, Novotel is much more comfortable and spacious. Ironing board, bath robes, swimming pool, 24hr gym etc are more than adequate.the hotel also provides shuttle services to the nearby shops etc. Would definitely recommend staying here when in town.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for the third times already, never get bored. Beside the location and the room, the staffs also were kind. Special thanks to Ash who assisted me during the stay. Will definitely come back soon!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This Novotel is a new building hotel with Mercure hotel side by side.The Room is modern and cozy. Breakfast nice food with many varieties.I got upgrade and can enjoy the Premier Lounge, with a nice evening cocktail.They also got free shuttle to Orchard area.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel provides the typical Novotel experience with good sized rooms. The biggest challenge is the location. It is in a residential area and there are no amenities. The closest atm, for example, is a 20 minutes walk in the heat towards orchard. Also, no food or dining options after 11 pm at night. If you are looking for better value for your money, choose the mercure which is basically in the same building. Also, the Novotel at Clarke quay is a much better location at similar rates. On the other hand, if Malaysian food is your thing, one of the best restaurants in town Pappa Rich is next door!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If and when I come back to Singapore I want to stay here. Cool, calm, clean, beautiful surroundings. Regular shuttle bus to shopping centre and transport routes.Fab pool and goody places nearby. Brilliant breakfast and proper coffee in room.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room is clean, service is decent, good location. Great room design and decent breakfast buffet as extra points.We enjoyed our stay here even only as a short get away from daily busy life in Singapore. Those who stay here for holiday would definitely find it even better.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed in the hotel for a night just to celebrate a special occassion. It was a smooth check in and was greeted by Kim who didn’t lose her smile all through out the check in. The hotel location is good, the Stevens MRT is walkable in about 10-15mins however they provice complimentary shuttle service to Orchard road which is great specially if you feel like going out and do a bit of shopping. Breakfast is good, and has a lot of options. They also have two pools sharing with the guests in Mercure that is just next to Novotel, they have lap pool and infinity pool. It is open until 10pm and eventhough my partner arrived late we were able to enjoy the facilities.The room itself is very comfy, our room doesnt have bathtub compared to all Novotel I have stayed in Asia, but I guess it’s okay as everything is provided to you. Mini bar and room service I will rate as “okay”. Very limited options so we didnt use it.Overall experience is great, we had a great stay, plus they prepared a small cake for us whoch we highly appreciate.Thanks again Novotel Stevens team!
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Modern hotel, excellent room with a big comfortable bed. The staff were always friendly and helpful. A free shuttle gets you to the major shopping centres on Orchard RD within minutes. Most other attractions are only a short taxi ride away.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful hotel! - check in process took long . - Room was nice and cozy . Good view.Comfortable bed-Excellent swimming pool- Indian Restaurant in the hotel premises- great breakfast spread- hotel provides pick up and drop to orchard rd.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Always a good stay.A bit of a victim of its own success , club lounge wise, given the last few times have stayed , seats were limited and is at capacity. It is poorly configured and seriously needs to have a different lay out. The staff however are excellent. Amy John and the rest of the crew are exceptional.The rooms are smallish but clean, neat and comfortable. The location is terrific, close to Orchard Rd, Botanical Gardens and has a heap of new food offerings scattered outside the front door.Two excellent swimming pools and a great gym. First rate. A definite winner. Really good staff at reception and in Club lounge. Love this hotel.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My team stayed for a week at Novotel Stevens and we enjoyed every minute of it ! We got a twin bed superior room and though the space is small, it's quite functional. The toilet is separated from the shower and the sink in the middle which makes it practical. Further, aircon is very good and internet is fast. The breakfast has awesome options from bacon, to cheeses and local dishes. And what's more amazing is the service! I would like to personally commend the head person at The Food Exchange (the buffet area of the hotel), Rayan. He is very friendly, helpful and we felt very much taken cared of! Also commending Elise, one of the servers, she's really nice and takes care of us as well. They even check on how we're doing and how the food is. The chef at the egg station is also very very nice :) I will come back to this hotel. It's very near Orchard, but its very quiet and tranquil. Conducive to long walks :) Thanks again to the staff of Novotel! I recommend to be an Accor Plus member so that you get the benefits as well :)
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very pleasant and clean new Novotel with a shuttle service to the shopping malls. No real connection in the vicinity to the MRT, but there are buses and the shuttle bus takes you to the Orchard MRT station. Great staff, very professional and friendly. Very impressive lounge with great canapes for the start to the evening. Excellent place to stay.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Last year, a friend of mine celebrated his birthday in Food Exchange, Novotel Singapore on Stevens. It was a great venue, with great food and services. In fact, everything was so fine that, this year, he decided to celebrate his birthday at the same venue! Food Exchange is a classy dining place, with lots of fresh seafood. One of the main reasons that my friend chose this place to celebrate his birthday is the fresh salmon sashimi, which is incomparable! Of course, the service there is also first class. We would like to thank Deep, Tamil, Chef Kong and their team for a memorable evening. My friend thoroughly enjoyed his birthday dinner.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel itself is great. The styling is great and the gym and pool facilities are great. The added bonus is the laundry room that you can use whenever. I stayed on the Novotel side. The club lounge is somewhat small but is great when you go there on non busy times. The room service will get mixed reviews. You can either order it by web or by phone, however if you order byt he web they will call you back to confirm the order. They say it taked about 45 min but it came faster. However on the second time when I used roomservice they completely forgot my order and I called them twice to remind them about it. It was a bit unfortunate. The shutte is great to the city centre but the public transport bus is faster. The shuttle gets stuck at the mall where there are other tourst busses loading passengers, so most of the time is just spent time sitting and waiting to get off.So the hotel is great and facilitiues good. Location wise a bit out of the tourist path but good location for business travellers.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay for nearly a month and found that, despite the Hotel being spotless and my room being light, airy and well-serviced, the main thing I enjoyed about my stay was the friendliness of the Staff. I felt welcome from the moment I arrived....the Concierge always assists to find your ride in the morning and then opens the car door with a friendly 'Welcome Back' at the end of the day. All staff greet you with a friendly smile from the cleaning staff to the front desk - but I'd particularly like to thank the lovely staff in the Executive Lounge - Mira, John, Eloisus and others - for their incredible hospitality........
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I received a warm welcome on checking in and found everything during my stay to fully meet my expectations. All of the staff members with whom I interacted were very helpful. e.g. on checking out, I mentioned that I was going to spend the rest of the day touring Singapore and was told that I could have a shower in the fitness centre before catching my late night flight. I did appreciate being able to arrive at the airport feeling refreshed.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the 2nd time to stay at Novotel Singapore On Stevens during my business trip. Feel..like to stay at home..the room is comfortable and clean. Thanks for your warm welcome with your big smiles. See you again for my 3rd business trip @Singapore ^^=
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stay for 5 nights.. really enjoy the stay.. i book for connecting rooms, the beds was comfy.. but there is no conveniece store around the area. I always travel with taxi, because there is no mrt around.. i don’t know about the bus stop, i never use the bus. Sometimes i use shuttle bus to orchard, the shuttle start from 10 am.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There is nothing not to be liked about this hotel.Excellent price for location and service.Modern room, excellent amenities, beautiful hall...A few minutes away from Orchard by bus (stop just outside on the right: lines 190 or 972); hotel also provides a shuttle on schedule.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed in this hotel for 9 day's.Room 307.The room was nice, the bed was very good. The wifi is also very good all over the hotel.The breakfast is just ok. The outdoor pool area. It's a nice pool, but the staff needs training. They don't clean up the left behind pool towels, the empty glasses , .....this can be much better. The people that work at the reception are very competent and friendly. The hotel is 15 min walk from the subway.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at the Novotel on Stevens for 6 nights in February for a work conference. It was a pleasant stay - the hotel is brand new. I did have a small problem with my sink on the first night when I shaved, but this was remedied very quickly when I called reception. The rooms are very comfortable, and the shower offers a rain-shower or hand-shower option. The buffets for lunch and breakfast were plentiful and the service from staff there was excellent. I also must commend the Reception staff for being wonderfully accomodating, one staff member going to the extra effort of getting his own mints from his car when there were none left at the front counter.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wow what an amazing experience me and my partner had at Novotel on Stevens. The room was perfect with huge bed and Telly. 10/10 for the breakfast buffet with a choice of food from a number of different countries. The best gym I have been to at a hotel and 2 fantastic pools with great views of the city. The staff were also very professional but personal at the same time. I highly recommend this place.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are very clean and so do the towels and glasses. We asked for a double bed, which is very comfortable. ANd I assure you, it's quiet! The noise in the corridor or from the next room will never be heard. The swimming pools are my favorite. There are shallow areas and an extra children pool, which makes it very easy for my kid to swim in both of them. The swimming towel is just beside the pool and the towels are always warm and dry.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I like the hotel’s ambience. Its very new and modern compared to other Novotel hotels. My favorite is the pool. If you want a quiet location, the hotel is good and they have shuttle going to Orchard so its a plus.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very enjoyable place, close to the main area's of attraction and business centers and within reach. Has good space and areas to meet for business and in a relaxing surrounding. Very Clean and new, good atmosphere all around.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is well laid out & easy walking distance to Orchard Road. What I find very disappointing about the hotel is the lack of friendliness that you get as a regular customer compared to other hotels around Asia. Each time I have checked in I am treated as someone who has not been there before. A simple thing as "Welcome Back Mr... would create that friendly atmosphere. Then to again have to complete all the check in details when they are on file just makes everything unfriendly.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The front desk staff was very lovely and helpful Due to my late flight, i was able to do very late check out, which is so much more helpfulEveryone was just so friendly, only that for a Novotel standard, the bathroom amenities was not that good and the fist day i was there, i had to call housekeeping as the room was not cleaned and made up.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at the Premier Room in Jan 19. The room provide free minibar and free access to premier lounge. The room is very nice and very good.The hotel also provide free shuttle to orchard road. If you want to go to Steven MRT, you just only need to go by bus. And it is only 2 bus stops from the hotel.They also provide laundromat machine at 2nd Fl. if you have to need to wash your clothes.Overall, it is excellent stay and I would come back again to Novotel on Steven Hotel.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel had everything that we had expected. Check-in was a breeze, and the room was beautiful. But what has made the stay unforgettable, was the action of a staff, Catherine (from Mercure). The wife had wandered off next door to Mercure Stevens Road, and was looking to buy something. It was Catherine (of Mercure) who went all out to help. Totally beyond her call of duty.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Calm place, Great Breakfast, lovely Pool, Enjoyed the trip and family time. Every hour Hotel Organised Bus is available to drop at Orchard Road, Otherwise, Public Transport is available just 2 mins at bus stop. Very Nice Neighbour hood.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a 3 day stop over here at the Novotel on Stevens. Very good location and close to Orchard Road. Many good restaurants around the Hotel and very affordable. The Room was very good and Comfortable. The only complaint was the price of a beer and Wine. We found it far cheaper to have happy hour out side in a restaurant than in the hotel.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I only travel Accor (I am a Gold member moving towards platinum!) and I have very high standards. I must say my stay thus far (I’m here until Saturday) has been exceptional. I was met with great service even though checking in at midnight after a long flight. The room is fantastic. It’s a new hotel and they have clearly designed the rooms with the modern customer in mind. Awesome shower, massive new TV, USB and international power connections and even an app to order room service. Everything just makes sense. I haven’t been in the infinity pool but it looks great. Breakfast has a broad and high quality range. Massively impressed and I just flew in from Sofitel Sydney and actually felt this was better at half the price. The customer service and the team there are AWESOME. Highly recommended to stay here when in Singapore
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wow for everything,nice breakfast, nice ambience, room space satisfying area, amenities good, cleanliness room , staff services nice and wellcome,good location,worth for the money, have nice swimming pool, good
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice sized and comfortable rooms with amazing Singapore city views all around. Everything met up to expectations and more. Theres nothing like jumping into those most comfortable beds with pillows galore! Novatel is one of our favorite stays all over the world, and always a very good value.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this hotel many times (2 times in January) and will certainly stay at the same hotel whenever I visit Singapore again in future. Everyone working at the Executive Lounge were friendly, helpful and professional. Food at Winestone was very good and services were excellent. Bulgogi with rice at Food Exchange could be better as it seemed to have the beef stir frying in soy sauce and missing other ingredients such as mirim... I had an unpleasant experience at the L'Aperitif Tapas Bar on Jan 23 early evening with a business guest as the server was not friendly at all (no smile and no acknowledgement). The place was not busy as we were the only guests having wine at that time and he only cared to talk to one of the passing by colleague. In general, this is a great hotel and I prefer this one than other Accor hotels in Singapore.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very nice and near to Orchad road. the room is comfortable and clean, all the staff are friendly. Stay at this hotel and you will feel the hospitality and you will feel welcome here. Every morning there is a shuttle bus that brings you to Botanical Garden and Orchard road. There is a bus stop just a few steps from the hotel. The infinite pool is also good for relaxing. Stay here and you will feel the friendliness
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Safe, quiet location with friendly helpful staff. We are from North America so had to ask for facecloths in the room. Pool is lovely and it is nice to have places to eat close at hand. The shuttle to Orchard Road is a nice extra and the hotel is a 10 minute walk from the MRT. Would stay there again for sure.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful 3 night stay at the Novotel Singapore On Stevens. We arrived earlier than expected and before check in time but the hotel were able to give us an early check in which we really appreciated. The reception staff were just lovely and extremely helpful during our stay especially with tourist destinations and advice on places to eat. I had a problem with my credit card and I really appreciate how well they managed that. The rooms we had were modern and clean and the beds were very comfortable. They have a free shuttle bus every half hour to Orchard road which we used daily and the hotel is about a 15 min walk from the mrt. We loved the Infinity pool and the gym is awesome too. Breakfast had everything you need and I really loved the coffee!What more can I say?...we really enjoyed our stay and we would definitely recommend and stay there again.
hotelName:
7    Novotel Singapore On Stevens
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This Trip I am satisfy with the service especially the House Keeping that they always keep my room clean and also the service from the counter check in and check out.. They Greet me with Smile and also Fast Services with what I need.. WELL DONE...
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are clean, although a bit small but very functional. Love the go green concept - glass bottle, paper pen, paper straws & cups with drink able water or refill at Level 3. Great buffet breakfast and welcome drink selection.Convenient location with huge hawker center right at the back of the hotel. Fried carrot cake, boneless hainanese chix rice, Spore rojak is a must try. Yummy! Easy access to public transport and mrt.Parking is for hotel guests.Overall, love the hotel and its services provided. If it's raining, u can even borrow their umbrella and return it after using. The only thing I'd like to comment is staff friendliness. This could certainly be improved especially from the slim, tall lady at the front desk. Smile more. Housekeeping staffs are awesome, very friendly. F&B as well, super efficient. Cheers !~
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, close to Bencoolen and Bugis MRT, there is a supermarket close by, taxis always waiting outside, although we used Grab. Also two mosques within walking distance (Bencoolen and Abdul Gaffoor). Nice market stalls within 1 min walking distance. Lillte India was a 10 min walk away with plenty of food places to choose from. Room was very small and basic, had to keep suitcases stacked up to walk from side to the other. Bathroom was small but adequate, shampoo and shower gel provided in bottles attached to wall. Breakfast was ok, nothing too fancy. Internet corner was a great touch and free to use. Staff throughout our stay were incredibly helpful and polite and could not do enough to help, thank you so much!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, close to train station.I would say everthing is in a medium level: basic room, not too fancy and standard size. Buffet for breakfast, nothing special.the best thing: staff; really good service.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was our second stay at this hotel and will also be the last. This booking was made over 6 months ago. Had three double rooms booked for three people. Arrived about 7pm after a 14 hour flight was checked into our rooms on the 4th floor. All three rooms were smoking room, which we did not request. I called down to the front desk and spoke to a lady and advised her that we did not book smoking rooms, having asthma and other health issue that the smoking would trigger we did not want to stay in the rooms. Guest services lady couldn't care less she just kept saying that they were totally booked up or that house keeping could refresh our room. I then asked if they are totally booked why is it that when  I check booking.com they still had rooms listed for the night? I then asked so what your saying is you 100% don't have any rooms available tonight? I was told that's correct they do not have anyrooms as they are fully booked. After being brushed off after several calls from the room and been put on hold so she could check with the manager I was finally told by guest services that she had spoken to the manager and we should bring our luggage and come back downstairs. So after dragging our luggage back downstairs again we had to line up and wait to be served . The guest services agent that I was speaking to on the phone and manager were nowhere to be seen. Once we were served again we were told that yes there are non smoking room available but that it would be twin rooms. We took the twin rooms and went back up to the 7th floor. So beware you may find yourself in a smoking room that you haven't booked. If you are allocated the wrong room by no fault of your own you will be expected to move all of your luggage with no offer to help. Guest services needs to take health concerns more seriously. They acted like they were doing us a favour by moving rooms. NO we did not want any special treatment, upgrade or discount we just wanted the rooms that we booked and paid for without having a dretremintal affects to our health. Also it's a good policy not to lie to your guests.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stay for 3 nights and booked through Accor. Room is small but very clean and smell nice. Locatian is near the Bencoolen and Bugis MRT. The Hotel provide refill water at the 3rd floor. SevenEleven just a next door.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is situated around 5 minutes walk from Bugis MRT, very convenient when coming from the airport. During check in, Esther at the priority desk was very friendly. Even though my online check-in I requested for 6pm check-in, due to last minute plan changes, I arrived around 12pm. However, I was able to get my room within 20 minutes, very impressed by it! All other staff were also very friendly and the welcome drink was good. Will definitely come back here again!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have researched and compared at least 8 hotels near to my favorite mall, Bugis junction. Last time we visited Singapore, we stayed at Marrison hotel, which is closest to Bugis Junction, but the bed and the room is too small for us and free breakfast is so disappointing that we skipped them. I decided to stay at Ibis and we were happy with our choice. The room and the bed was much bigger than Harrison’s although we had to walk more than 15 minutes to Bugis MRT. There was a wet market 5 minutes from the hotel where you can find some interesting to buy.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed in this hotel several times over many years. The quality of service and facilities have remained consistent. Over the years they have provided more food in the one hotel outlet through the day although this is limited by the size of the dining facilities and that the captive clientele. Currently there was a very competitively priced Thai Buffet at lunch time. In addition the Restaurant gives a 20 % off main food items for Accor Members as long as you are in-house and can prove it ( normally to refer them to front desk/reception). Take care with room maintenance if some of the previous guests had requested the bathroom light and shaver socket be fixed I would not have had to! Lighting in the room is exceptional. East to turn everything on/off and the brightness makes any reading relaxing and easy. The hotel provides everything you need in a basic hotel room in which you are mostly out during the daytime if on business.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at IBIS Bencoolen for 6 nights. The rooms are tiny just like any IBIS but really clean. The housekeeping does a great job! The breakfast spread is okay, but there are several options close by. Located 2min from Bugis you can find many eateries and places to shop.The best about the hotel is wifi, the speed is awesome. No frills but an awesome stay at IBIS.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stay there for short business trip. The hotel as well as the location are good. Access to the hotel is also consider easy.Tried the breakfast, selection are vary from continental menu to international menu.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Chk in was smooth. Rooms were as per ibis standard. Toilet was good but they don’t hv jet commode shower. They have a iron with a board where you can iron your clothes if needed. Breakfast was quite good with cuisine from western ,Indian ,Japanese , Korean.There was a free Internet corner .The restaurant where we enjoyed lunch was superb. The location was also pretty good . All the attractions were nearby. Next time I would like to stay here . Though my husband and my father are members of Accor still they didn’t allow late chk out at 4 which we expected as we had a late flight and we had aged parents with us. May be they were full on that day. They could have considered at least by giving us 1 room .There is a 7-11 next to the hotel which remains open 24 hrs and also a nice temple of Krisna and Rukmini ji next door.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is probably one of the best of many Ibis hotels I have been in. The service was excellent, the variety of breakfast food enormous and the ambiance of the hotel very pleasing.. It is also near three metro stations and within easy walking distance of the Indian and Arab quarters.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 5 nights. The location is perfect, close to everything you need. 7 Eleven is just outside the hotel. Breakfast is delicious. Universal studios is just 20 minutes drive from here. We really enjoyed our stay here and will definitely come back.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Being located near Bugis, Ronchor and Bencoolen MRTs, as well a bus stop nearby, you can get to most parts of the city.Lots of shops and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel - lots to choose from.Breakfast can be bit hectic and people should be mindful/respectful to others, eg I observed one lady picking up some Indian bread found that they not to her liking and put them back (perhaps use the tongs provided?). Staff were very efficient in clearing tables and did their best to deal with the masses at breakfast.Clean and compact rooms, beds are really comfortable to sleep on.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for the first two nights of our honeymoon as we were site seeing and it was perfect. Brilliant location, clean rooms and staff were very helpful. Rooms weren't huge but absolutely fine when you don't stay there too long. Brilliant!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I liek the fact that they have available computers at the lobbby to be used by the guests while waiting for the rides. FD staff are very courteous and friendly. For the Breakfast -I suggest to put more continental bfast choices. I feel there is a lack of it. Nonetheless the location is perfect.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have no complaints about our couple of nights at this hotel. Room was clean and of a reasonable size for two (though only just). Room features included bar fridge, electric jug, teas etc (though no teaspoon), wall safe, ironing board, iron, hairdryer. That is, everything we needed. Wifi reception was good, didn't turn on TV. Probably best of all was the hotel's very central location, with four MRT stations within an easy walk, including Bugis Station from which we could take a train direct to Changi Airport. Would certainly stay here again.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All staff members that I encountered at this hotel from the time I checked in up to the time I checked out were just wonderful. Attentive and always willing to help with a smile. They just made my stay comfortable and unforgettable.Congratulations to the management for recruiting a great staff...
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Enjoyed our 4 nights here , room clean, bed good , shower good , tv size ok but could be bigger in this day and age , breakfast good and all you can eat but not ultra cheap, close to Orchard road if you like a walk, taxis nearly always out the front and found them really well priced, staff always helpful
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kudos to the best service in Ibis! These people are legends. thanks to Simon Ho my mom felt herself so comfortable and relaxed and thanks to Ned who was telling us funny stories and always has been attentive and friendly. Hope to come back soon.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After a tiring day touring around Singapore, you look forward to a clean & cozy hotel room and that would be at Ibis Singapore on Bencoolen. The hotel is 2 blocks away from the Bugis market/Bugis Junction Mall, very near the Bugis or Rochor MRT station, & a few blocks away from Little India. Our room was cleaned daily & supplies replenished. Arriving at the hotel at 2:00AM, we were met by a friendly & accommodating reception clerk. The breakfast buffet is somewhat alright though we just wish they serve or have better choices in the food selection. Well ..... can’t have them all, we’re still happy having stayed at Ibis.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel - good choice for stay long days and wanna go around the city with short distance. The service looks very good and the room is clean. The food should offer more choices for different country, it seems the same everyday with Indian, Japanese and Chinese food only.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you come by MRT, get off at Bencoolen station. Take exit A. Turn right when you come out of exit A. Walk 3 minutes or 270 Meters you will arrive at this hotel.I notice there are a few south east Asian put their bare feet in lobby sofa . For that reason I would not sit in lobby.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When picking a hotel in Singapore I wanted to be central and close to the MRT.This hotel was close to 3 MRT Stations Bencoolen, Little India and Bugis.Also there were bus stops right outside the hotel.Orchard Rd is a 20min walk.Little India and Bugis St were within walking distance.Broadway food court is at the base of Sim Lim Sq.There was a buffett breakfast which had a variety of food and was a good standard.The room was a decent size for one person. The room was clean on arrival and well cleaned daily.I cannot remember seeing an alarm clock in the room which i found odd.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a fantastic experience at Ibis Bencoolen Singapore restaurant!The food at the buffet are sumptuous and really delicious! Thai Cuisine$12++ buffet is value for money!!!VICKY is a total gem of IBIS Bencoolen and real pride of Accor family!She's cool, very accommodating, super friendly and extremely pleasant manager!!! Look for VICKY for a great dining experience and great value for money buffet!!! Overall experience 5 stars and 5 spoons being the highest rate! ✨❤️
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My comparable room in Bangkok was three times the size but only one third the price. New, and super clean. Quiet, except for hallway noise. No staff in the lobby at all except busy check-in people. No maps of the immediate area, but there were maps of the whole city. I chose this hotel partly because other reviewers mentioned the 6 vegetarian restaurants in the building next door. Sadly, they serve only unidentifiable Chinese stuff, and there is no one at any of them available to explain what anything is. We found a little Western food in the area, and two Thai places a block down to the left and across the street. The restaurant in the hotel featured "Local Chinese Favorites" which is insane because there are 100 restaurants nearby serving those wretched favorites. No wonder they have few customers. Breakfast in the hotel was priced too high. I hated this hotel. If you need to change money, go out the back door and go in the rear entrance of the bldg on your left.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is in a fairly quiet location so not much traffic noise, rooms are small and basic but functional and nice decor, great selection of meals at the buffet breakfast.Most notable item for this hotel is the location, within a 5 minute walk to hawker markets, street markets, site seeing features and shopping outlets.Totally recommended.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was very comfortable and centrally located. Walking distance to a number places like Bugis, Arab St, Haji lane, Little India and train station /buses. Staff were very friendly and helpful with queries and our requests. Highly recommended place.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very happy with the choise of this hotel.The service was amazing and the hotel itself is located in a good location.The hotel price is low for the value.Moreover, they gave us a nice present for our honeymoon.Wormly recommend!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a very nice Ibis in Singapore. Located at walking distance from 2 temples, Bugis Commercial area, Little India. Comfortable beds, electrical kettle for tea and coffee, hair dryer, iron and iron board.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked the hotel for 10 days and currently staying in the hotel. The room is decent in size comfortable for a family of 4 ( 2small kid's below 6 years). The room was arranged in tidy always and the hotel management takes care of any feedback you give instantly.Nice restaurants nearby and 3 mrt stations close by. We got a free room upgrade and the snacks in the mini fridge are free every day.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location in Singapour Good value for money. Very good service including free luggage room and possibility to take a shower at the end of the day even after check out (great service especially when you have a flight late evening) .
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I visited this hotel for 4D3N.. overall it’s great experience stayed in this hotel.. near bugis market (it’s a place for shopping for souvenirs).. near Bencoolen MRT station and Bugis MRT station.. near Albert Center Food Court
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here again three years after first visits. The quality of the hotel has gone down. Staff are less attentive and the breakfast is not as good as it was. Room, although small, was clean. Decent wifi. This hotel is not worth the price charged.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my "go-to" hotel in many cities - but especially Singapore. I've stayed in many hotels in Singapore and this one has a decent sized room, very comfortable beds and it is in a great location for shopping and easy access to MRT.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of hotel is very convenient to MRT station and Bus Stop. Hotel also provides Ezlink card which can be used for transportation through Metro or Bus. One can top up ezlink cards through 7 eleven stores which is approx 100 metres from the hotel. Rooms are good, spacious and has good view. Hotel is surrounded by great eating options. Hotel's staff was really helpful and provided excellent service. I would recommend travelling
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this is first time we stayed at this hotel, receptionist hotel (name: Megan) had been served us very well. She tried to get our room connected with my child and talking to the manager to get it..thank you so much,Megan..two thumbs up for you..The hotel has strategic location, lots of eating places around the hotel and walking distance to the mallthe rooms are comfortable, housekeeping works well
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: They treat me well when i stay in this hotel , such a great service they gave , really comfirt and will be back soon for next bussiness trip , see u all friendly staff , thank you for your best service
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Rooms are your typical Ibis, including some extras like fridge, iron and good air-conditioning.Restaurant is great for an Ibis: extensive breakfast buffet including many Asian and Indian options, as well as espresso machines, etc. Lunch buffet quite good and very affordable.For Accor status holders, the welcome drink amenity is great and includes liquor. The hotel doesn't have a pool and gym is off-site and supposedly an extra $15 but no one charged me anything.I would stay again, although the price is high considering it's a fairly basic level of accommodation.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the 2nd or 3rd time I have stayed at this hotel, and it hasn't disappointing me yet! The location is between Bugis and Bencoolen, 5 minutes to each. It is surrounded by great eating options and attractions. The breakfast is good and the restaurant is also great value and you will be well looked after by Ned!!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have stayed here a few times and find the staff very good. The room was quite large, but basic and very clean. It is close to Little India underground station and restaurants and easy access to transport.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you want stay not far from centre of the city this is the place to stay, it a very clean modern Hotel, with lovely rooms.It is also close to Big Red Bus Stop, which handy to jump onto to get your bearings of knowledge of where things are and what to see.We stayed for three nights as we had flown direct from the UK, so as to see Singapore as well as get over the jet lag.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at this hotel whenever I came to Singapore. Location is superb from Airport took the MRT to Tanah Merah and change to city line to Bugis Station. Walking distance to hotel from Station took less than 10 min through the Bugis village. Where local food is concerned there is Albert food centre. Thereby shopping is OG and many others restaurant. Hotel staff is courteous specially Mohan and managed to meet the GM Jessica. Will definitely come back to stay again.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice, clean hotel with a good breakfast buffet. The location was very convenient to transportation, food, and shopping. It was well priced and clean. Bencoolen has many restaurants and money exchange was located within walking distance.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am pleasantly surprised and impressed with the service and food at ibis.Being a very troublesome customer myself, Rebecca from Sales has patiently answered all my queries regarding to my boy full month celebration. I have also made numerous requests from my end and Rebecca always tried her best to assist me.The stay at ibis started with the exceptionally good service from the front desk. During check in, I asked the staff if there’s any baby bathtub to be used at the hotel and I was not surprise hearing the answer no as 3 stars hotel usually do not have one provided. The duty manager, Indra (I hope I get the name right) overheard our conversation and came over to attend to us. He mentioned that it is a good idea to have one at the hotel for guest and went off to buy one for our use. The one he bought is also suitable for a one month old as it comes with an adapter for the baby to lie on. I am truly impressed as my boy gets to have a sweet bath at the hotel. The manager also heard from us that we are holding a full month celebration for our boy and hence gave us the possibility of a late check out. With 3 young kids, we truly appreciate these check out as we do not need to hurry so much after the event to pack our bag. During the stay, we realized that the room are always tidied up and we also had our bar replenished (which we didn’t expect too)As for the full month celebration, we were truly astonished with the setup and decoration put up by the staff. Many of my guests also complimented the food served as the food was placed on induction cooker and the food were all warm and delicious. The head chef and director of sales also came down before the start of the event to ensure that everything is in place. This is true teamwork of the management and staff. I really have to say that the celebration is truly value for $ and I will definitely recommend it to others looking for a function to be held.Initially I was a little apprehensive about staying and holding the celebration at ibis but ibis has truly show me that a 3 star hotel can have a 6 star service!Thank you everyone for the great stay and celebration !
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good experience overall. Satisfactory breakfast but would need to improve the bakery items (croissants, chocolate croissants) which were served soft and not presented nicely (more cantine style than restaurant.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall service is excellent, room is clean but very small. Walls are a bit thin, so if people are loud in the corridor, we can hear them in the room.This hotel changes the a/c filters regularly, which was a nice surprise.Location is also very good, many places to eat around the hotel, at walking distance.Breakfast buffet is disappointing, I stayed for over a week, and the food did not change. Also, the egg station starts at 7 or 7:30 when the buffet starts at 6:00. It would make more sense for it to start during the buffet opening hours.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our 2nd intl trip last year was at Singapore. We choosed Ibis Bencoolen as our Hotel to stayed in 4 days 3 nights. Because my friend was an accor member that time got big discounts. Imagine we check in for 5 rooms for the group of 13. We travelled always with friends and loved ones.Our iterinary was Sentosa,Universal Studio, Merlion park,Singapore national museum and side trip going to Johor,Malaysia. I was amazed on their perks, especially the beep card access cards that can be re load. It can be used for travelling MTR and electronic fare at the bus. Also can be used to purchased some goods and foods at 7 eleven. They have also a good spot for wifi. And near to the biggest shopping market known " Bugis ". It was 10 mins walking from the hotel. And 20 mins walking going to MTR. While going to Singapore National Museum it took as 45mins walking. This place was an earth friendly hotel because they are glass container for drinking water they do not use plastic bottle. We experienced their intercontinental breakfast to choose with. I missed the kayak toast jam and marmalades. Their room was neat and clean a compact place. You can unpack all your clothes and hang it on their closet. Even you left your valuables things it still intact when you go back to your room. Everyday there was a room service to replace your used towels and some toiletries. All the staffs at the hotel was courteous and hospitable even we are Filipinos they are all gracious to us. Highly recommended this hotel if had trip going to Singapore.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is okay and the basic room is ideal for a single occupancy. Rooms are clean but compact with a nice breakfast spread. The staff are professional and courteous. Despite being an ‘ibis’ the rates were high.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For someone who needs a clean, comfortable & convenient for walking place in the center! Good amenities as you can see in the description, next to it many restaurants to try a big variety of food, few minutes from metro station to airport! Satisfied!
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We've stayed at this Ibis many times and it continues to be a reasonable hotel with most things you need. The room is small but adequate, unlike many other hotels in Singapore. It's very well located, reasonably close to Bugis and Bencoolen MRT stations and lots of bus routes. The only issue is that, sometimes, it gets very pricey for what it offers. When that happens, we look at other places but we haven't found an ideal replacement yet.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Yes like many others have said the rooms are small. My husband and I had two big bags, a carry-on, and a backpack. We did manage to find places for them all, one went on the desk!! This was the only negative we had about the hotel. The best thing was the location. Close to three subway stations all within a 5 - 8 minute walk from the hotel. We used the subway constantly. Tip buy an EZ link card rather than the Tourist card, muc( more cost effective. It was also close to the shopping in Bugis street, and there was a Hawker market behind the hotel, a short walk away.Our booking included a daily free breakfast, and there was a decent selection for different nationalities. The staff were all very pleasant, we enjoyed staying in this hotel.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thoroughly enjoyed my one day stay in Ibis Bencoolen as usual. Room n bathroom were clean, comfortable. Buffet Breakfast had plenty of options to suit all palates. Check in was smooth, staff were polite and helpful. Hotel is a stone's throw from Bugis Junction and MRT.
hotelName:
8    ibis Singapore on Bencoolen Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel, very clean, modern rooms, great restaurant and rooftop bar with fantastic view of the city. The front desk staff was beyond exceptional with service and assistance; more so than I have ever experienced at any other hotel.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful stay at the Courtyard Singapore Novena. Our room was on the 30th floor with floor to ceiling windows. The room is smaller compared to other Courtyards that I've stayed at but for 2 people it's okay. I love the Nespresso machine in the room with 2 complimentary water bottles. The buffet breakfast was great, awesome food selection. There's an omelet and noodle bar as well as a good selection of fruit and pastries. The front desk staff were all friendly and accommodating. We will be back the next time we visit Singapore.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love the buffet at this hotel. pricing is not steep and service is very good. love the salads. so crispy and fresh. the compliemtary coffee came piping hot and whats most impt is that the milk that comes in a separate jug is warm.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
