review_body: The staff was very kind and incredibly helpful with every query I had. The room was exquisite, comfy bed and one really cool large screen TV. Breakfast was a bit repetitive each day, but I can live with it. I would’ve given it 5 stars if it weren’t for the prices. Something you’d have to look forward to if you plan to visit Singapore. Singapore is really expensive.Apart from that, I loved my stay on the 10th floor. You can almost see a large part of the city!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well located in Novena, just two metro stations from Orchard Road, modern with a rooftop outdoor pool n bar/restaurant area. Competent staff, well trained, friendly and recognising Marriott Elite members. Good breakfast on 22/F with a view over Singapore. The rooms however are small, very small indeed, so is the restaurant and the pool. However, all in all a very good new Marriott hotel (opened 2017).
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel for its location, and we will be back for the amenities and the buffet breakfast. The hotel is directly above the Novena MRT station, which makes getting around Singapore super easy. And the buffet breakfast was a very pleasant surprise. Not only can you have the usual western breakfast items, including a custom made omelet, but you can enjoy Asian breakfast items as well, ranging from nasi goreng to congee and baozis. But the real surprise was the infinity pool on the roof. The views are almost 360° from the harbor and the financial district to the green reservoir area to the north. Truly spectacular! My only complaint is that where is virtually no signage in the malls downstairs to indicate which mall exit leads to the hotel. I suggest you memorize the shop/restaurant you pass on your way to the mall/MRT station so you can find your way back to the hotel.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed in this hotel for a short trip in singapore and had a really lovely stay. the room is spacious, clean and everything was provided for. room service was excellent and the staff are really friendly and accommodating. the location’s really good, safe , close to all the sights and a few steps away from the nearest metro station. food was also delicious. highly recommended to all those who are thinking of travelling to songapore.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel with good amenities. Room was clean, although smaller than what I'm used to. Rooftop infinity pool with a wonderful view was a nice touch. Gym was a decent size with barely anybody using it. Service was friendly, although I had to reset my room card every time I came back, which was annoying since It meant I had to go down to the reception desk every time. They offered a baby crib at no extra charge which is quite convenient. Breakfast had a nice selection including noodle bar and egg station. The hotel is well situated with a shopping mall next door and surrounded by many dining options. Metro station is steps away which can take you almost anywhere. For everywhere else, taxis are quite convenient and the concierge desk can hail a taxi when required. Would consider staying there again next time I'm in Singapore.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is completly new.I was in a Basic (deluxe) room. It was really nice. Service at reception is really efficient and kind.Breakfast offers you a large variety of food, from western to asian.Swimming-pool has An amazing view and open till late at night.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed here during our celebration vacation for his birthday. I informed the hotel staff about his birthday and they were kind enough to give him a birthday cake in our room. The hotel is relatively new and is located near a mall. Our room, although a bit small, had a great view, nice shower and comfortable bed. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet, the rooftop bar and the pool with great views. The staff we encountered were all pleasant and courteous.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been staying at FourPoints all along, becouse theybare the cheapest in Marriot Bonvoy.But yeah, what u pay is what u get.That is FourPoints Riverview.Unlike Courtyard Marriot Novena,The price is very slighty higher, but u get all brand new feeling hotel, nicer staff and Marriot Bedding.Although the room is quite small, but it is worth every penny u spend.Exterior 5/5Interior 5/5Price 4/5Bedding 5/5Room size 4/5Location 5/5Overall 4.5/5
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is perfect for a business trip: nice location and there is swimming pool on the roof , open to get some nice air and a wonderful view on the city, very relaxing.Nevertheless, the restaurant has some very decent meals!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked 1 room for 4 nights for my parents and the experience was upsetting.Thanks to Hari, the conciarge that he was really helpful.however, we feedback to the front office since the night my parents stayed in that the basin was clogged up. Then the front office lady said she would ensure the necessary would be done. The 2nd night, assuming they had done the necessary, I was wrong. My parents feedback the basin still clogged. I helped them to feedback to the front office and she said the same thing. Going to the 3rd & 4th night, the clogged basin was still there. If they had done the necessary,It was not done properly as the basin still clogged till the last day they stayed! Their room number was #2320. I expected Marriott group will have a better customer service in providing solution to their guest.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is relatively new. Basic amenities in the room. Breakfast is ok. Tv in the room is rather weird. Sometime there’s no picture. The full length window made a nice touch to the room. Level 33 the Swimming pool has a very nice view.can see a nice view of Marina Bay. The MBS and the flyer too. Hotel located very near mrt station and shopping center . No worries for choice of food. 1 thing is the lobby level 22 smells weird.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As a gold member of Marriott Bonvoy, I was expecting a very welcoming vibe but not getting one instead of a sour face from the front desk, also had an issue with the breakfast too. However these issues was resolve with an immediate rectification from the duty manager "Mun". She did take her time to explain and solve the issue of this fussy customer. She handled pretty well.The breakfast was a little messy as the restaurant is kinda packed and our table was hijacked by another family while we were taking of food from the buffet. Anyhow there was another vacant uncleaned table and we asked if we could sit, and was allowed. Then the waiter took the serviette from the floor and wipe the watermarks on the table. I didnt bothered and sat the next chair as it was a 4 person table. I was not impressed at all on the waiter's doing.Was given an early check in and late check out which was very helpful as our flight is at 11pm, gave us extra hours to explore the city. Room is very clean, hot pressure shower, great TV channels, etc.No doubt the MRT is located right below the hotel but the down side is you need to ask around on the hotel exact entrance where you need to walk through shops and stair and a medical center lobby to reach the 1st lift system (hotel is a dual lift). The hotel lobby is located on the 22nd floor, guest room starts from the 23rd floor.Overall it is recommended, but could explore other Marriott family brand before coming back to Courtyard Novena.The best part is their air-conditioning wall controller is those normal type!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spend one week here with my girlfriend. Hotel is surrounded by three malls and is right ontop of a MRT station. Pool is great for sunrise. Staff was always friendly and Zhao Li took perfect care of our wellbeing and room. a second workout bench in the gym would be an improvement. We will book again when in Singapore next time.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: So this is our second visit in Singapore in less than 12 months. After feeling rather disappointed and not to mentioned ripped off by Marina Bay Sands I asked a friend to recommend a hotel. Pleasant surprise and not disappointed. Located near MRT with internal connection to a shopping mall. The hotel was a good choice for us. Quite new so everything still look rather fresh and clean. We met a very helpful concierge who recommended us places to eat. The rooftop pool was sufficient for short laps. Gym was pretty simple. Service was great... all the staff were courteous and professional. I'm guessing given space in Singapore is a luxury commodity, we do notice it from the size room. Compact although the size of the bed was generous. Afforadable and convenient... not a bad option for short stay
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my son just arrived in the hotel at 11 april at my son's birthday, when i come at the hotel the front desk officer Yvone was take care all my son reservation and my son check-in procedure very well and she so warm when she take care my son. I just little bit don't like the breakfast because i like a lot of variety for breakfast but it's not a big deal, also when we leave our room Zhou Li the house keeping take care our room very well. And we got late check out from the hotel also! Thank you so much Yvone for taking care of us from check-in until check-out! I'll come again with my wife.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my dad just arrived in the hotel in 11 april 2019 at my birthday lol, when i come at the hotel the front desk officer Yvone take care all my reservation and my check-in procedure very well. For the second day we were tried to taking the breakfast for the first at 22floor, actually the food is sooo good but i thought i got a lot of variety buffet food like the other premium hotel, but it’s okay the server and the chef are very good! Nice hospitality from them, and my room was take care by the Zhou Li the house keeping from Courtyard Hotel he’s very good at clean our room! Very nice person and always try to interact with other guest, in day 3 i asking for permission to get late checkout because my flight should be at 4.45pm so i can still enjoying my room for a moment before we’re leave from this hotel and once again Yvone was take care all of my permission to get late checkout at 1pm. Nice hotel, nice people and nice ambience! Thank you so much!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love the view from the room and its accessible locationHowever, it is a bit of inconvenient for guest to take lift twice every time they need to go out/back to the room. The lift on 22nd floor is too close to the entrance of the restaurant, can be quite crowded when the lift door opens during peak hours.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had very pleasant stay Chef Henry provided excellent customer service Excellent house keepin service I will recommend it to everyone in my network and also stayback again The location was well connected
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff and management are second to none. They go over and above any 5 star I have ever experienced. The rooms are very compact and efficient but the views are outstanding as is the attention to detail and the fact that no external noise invades your space. Yvonne at reception was wonderful and I can't say enough about Linda at the Sky lounge on the 33rd floor.Proximity to the Novena MRT makes taxis unnecessary as a fare is only $1.80 and the system is efficient, clean and safe.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pozoruhodný bol výhľad z izby. Izba má celú stenu zo skla a tak sa ponúka výborný výhľad rovno z postele. Raňajky boli na 4* hotel nadpriemerné. Raňajková káva, je štandardná, no je k dispozícii aj stroj na rôzne druhy káv. Hotel má recepciu až od 22. poschodia a čím je ubytovanie vyššie tým skôr dohliadnete až do malajského mesta Johor Bahru. Hotel je takpovediac nad stanicou metra, takže dostupnosť do centra je veľmi jednoduchá a rýchla.The view from the room was remarkable. The room has a full glass wall and offers great views from the bed. Breakfast was a 4 * hotel above average. Breakfast coffee is standard, but there is also a machine for different types of coffee. The hotel has a reception desk from the 22nd floor, and the higher the accommodation, the more you can see in the Malaysian city of Johor Bahru The hotel is well above the metro station, making it easy to reach the center.  · Iba jedna vec. Nebola možnosť sa prezliecť, po celodennom chodení po meste, keď sme si prišli naspäť do hotela pre batožinu, keď let bol až neskoro v noci. Inak nebolo čo hotelu vytknúť. Svojej kategorizácii robí dobré meno. Only one thing. There was no way to change it after all day walking around town when we came back to the luggage room when the flight was late at night. Otherwise there was nothing to criticize the hotel. He makes a good name for his categorization.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: October 15 Dexperience Day 5 Values:Sincerity, Focus, Balance, Perseverance, Continuous Improvement! Give Your Time, Energy & Effort To People You Love!#luxury #dexperience #michelin #posh #rich #food #hotel #travel #like #singapore #enjoy #happy #marriottDexperience Undercover Rating:Value 1/5Quality 2/5Service 1/5Ambience 2/5Experience 1/5Enter Dexperience List: Failed!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just checked out after a 1 night stay and must say I was impressed! Hotel is squeaky clean, fantastic staff and a great rooftop bar. Wifi was fast and reliable also. Special shout out to Miroshin on the front desk who was super helpful and friendly. Looking forward to coming back.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Don’t normally stay at Courtyards but was more convenient for work. Double elevator system so you have to go up to 22 floor for reception and then other elevators to get to rooms. This is no issue if you are out all day but if you do it several times a day becomes a bit of a pain. I got upgraded based on status to a better room but I was surprised at how small it was. Again not a big issue and understand based on land costs in Singapore. The gym is a let down. Some cardio machines and free weights but not much room to do anything. Breakfast was good and was included for me but a bit pricey if paying separate. Nice bar on rooftop but the inside section gets really busy. Overall it is an ok and was very convenient. Staff was very helpful.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is relatively new and provides a slightly lower cost Marriott option to some on Orchard Road.It sits on the upper floors of a building in Novena and occupies the 22nd to 33rd floor.The outdoor pool and bar on the 33rd offers great views.The rooms are smaller but overall this hotel did the job. Staff were friendly and helpful. Overall very good but the rooms are smaller than a full service Marriott..
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel has some friendly staffs. Being a bonvoy gold member got me an upgrade from a regular deluxe to premier room. Great! Sky view is excellent. Walking distance to novena MRT. Next to the mall. Very convenient.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is new, fresh and spotlessly clean.The hotel associates are consistently friendly and helpful, from the bellmen to the front desk. Yvonne at check in was so professional, even escorting us to the elevator.Infinity pool on 33rd floor is wonderful, quiet and spectacular view. The MRT 5 minute walk, stores and restaurant options plenty. Much prefer this area to the core city hotels that are overcrowded and inferior sevice.Congratulations to the management leadership team and associates at this hotel,Definitely earns a four star plus
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I give the hotel 5 star. Stayed for a week for a business trip. Very clean and trustworthy. Comfortable beds, great pool + gym, very nice food and convenient location.What makes this hotel special is people. Simply great team. Personal email at the end of the day from the manager was very thoughtful. All you need when you’re away from home.Minor issues here and there but nothing significant. Will come back.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved everything about the hotel. Convenient location near a mall, metro station and restaurants. Efficient service, hospitable and friendly staff. Great restaurant and hotel amenities. Rooms are clean with natural light. Don’t miss the rooftop bar and pool, great view of the city.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for one night as part of my Bonvoy Platinum challenge moving away from Hilton Honors and overall was really impressed with the hotel. As expected, room was small but it was really comfortable and functional, everything still looked and felt new, and the view was awesome with all the greeneries, absolutely had no problem with the design of the room. Breakfast had plenty of choices and all the staff members that I interacted with, were polite and helpful. Special mention goes to Lilly, who walked me to the guest elevator after checking me in and even pressed the floor button for me. I thought this was a very nice gesture, considering this was a limited service property and I was a Bonvoy nobody.If i had a criticism it would be that the restaurant design was open to the reception desk and the guest elevators making the already-small lobby felt even more cluttered and noisy. I also dislike that access to the roof-top bar is only through the guest elevators, this means outside visitors to the bar might gain access to guest room floors.But overall I was impressed with the hotel and looking forward to returning.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A perfectly adequate hotel, in a nice quiet location with surrounding facilities.Spotlessly clean, very efficient staff and generally all round professional. Located right next to a shopping centre and MRT is great as there are shops and restaurants right there.My only comment would be that the rooms are quite compact (which didnt bother me) but might be problematic for others.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Since Singapore is short on Marriott properties I thought I'd give this Courtyard a try for a short stay as the price was right (about 30% less than the other Marriott properties) and the location was convenient enough. in short, for a budget conscious traveller who does not need to work from the room, this property would be fine. The hotel is new, clean, and the shower is powerful and hot ... just what you need after an 18 hour flight. However, if you are in Singapore on business then there are a few significant drawbacks to this property. (1) There is *no* desk in the room or a proper desk chair. There is only a small glass table and a bench seat near the window. This is VERY uncomfortable and inconvenient if you are trying to get any work done. (2) The walls are paper thin. I could hear the conversation of the guests in the room next to me and they were just talking at normal voice level. (3) The rooms are very small ... even for Singapore standards ... there appears to be no bigger rooms even if you want one. (4) There is no Executive Lounge or complementary meeting room. All in all, I'd recommend this hotel to someone on a budget who is on holiday. For a business traveller, there are many better choices for the same or more expense.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros:- Quite well-designed for a Courtyard. Rooms are small but manageable, service is efficient.- The views from the rooms really are excellent, even in a city like Singapore with many skyscraper hotels. Floor to ceiling windows of course and the upside of the Novena location is that your views are uninterrupted. To think that I could see as far as Marina Bay from the rooftop pool was very impressive.- Novena location has its upsides. The hotel is right on top of the MRT and there are several malls around it so there’s a lot of convenience to be had.Cons:- The downside to Novena is that you’re not super close to most of the things you want to be close to - business, shopping, nightlife and restaurants all require travel. Novena is predominantly a medical and residential neighbourhood.- The hotel needs to rethink its toiletries. 22mL is the smallest bottle size I’ve ever seen at a hotel and is not even enough for one person to take one shower, let alone for two people who may want to shower twice in one day. Of course one can always call reception and ask for more to be sent up but who wants to do that every day?- The rooftop pool, while with impressive views, is quite small and not very pleasant for either swimming or lounging. The Urbana bar next to it is even more disappointing - service from the girl who greeted me on both occasions was very odd and disjointed, and the chilli crab pizza they serve is terrible.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very convenient and modern hotel (not only) for business trips. a descent breakfast menu, a bar and a swimming pool on the roof to chill out after a busy day. A well equipped gym and modern rooms with a multiple charging station for all kind of devices.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is quite comfortable to stay in at Courtyard as it is easy to access via public transport, close to malls and foods ; the environment is clean - just the television sometimes not functioning well (need to try a few times), house-keeping missing the kettle for the room (but very quick to send one once requested) and the pillow wasn't the best (having a headache after sleeping on it, as it is too soft and too low). Overall, it was a pleasant stay and thanks to Steffi on her assistance for check-in.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is very next to the Novena MRT and the rooms are very clean and nice and view.But the only the Breakfast needs to be modified with more choices and vegetarian choices. I was not happy with the breakfast on both the occasions during my stay.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've stay at Courtyard all over the planet...this is there TOP property! If you liked the 18th floor at the JW with your feet in the water and a Singapore sling in hand...the 33rd fitness and pool level is Heaven on earth at the Courtyard. My status scored me a corner room on the 32nd floor looking right at the Bayfront. You've probably passed on this venue because of room size and location, it is a mistake...check it out by exiting Novena MRT on the North side and walk 300 feet right to enter lobby. Novena Square is known for it's variety of food. BaanYing.SG is a 126-seater casual dining restaurant, located on the second floor of Royal Square in Novena. Baan Ying offers everyday Thai flavours as savoured by locals in the cosmopolitan setting of contemporary Thai Fuse...Tom Kha and Thai pineapple fried rice are amazing!
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Novena on 3 separate occasions last year, the last visit in late Dec for a total of 9 days. We thoroughly enjoyed all of our stays at this centrally located hotel. There are many restaurants, eateries and a couple of malls nearby, plus sheltered access to the MRT station. The hotel is relatively new so the rooms and facilities are in pretty good condition. We stayed in an accessible room which was bright, clean and cheery; although the room was compact in size, there was ample space to manoeuvre our wheelchair. More importantly, because of the open-concept room design, we appreciated the very efficient drainage and ventilation systems in the bathroom as this ensured that the room did not smell damp or musty. We adored the lovely orange and sandalwood toiletries!As Marriott Platinum members, we enjoyed various benefits including complimentary breakfast, drinks and hot food during evening cocktail hours. My husband especially enjoyed the small treats (popcorn, cookies, lemon tea etc.) given by the hotel during evening turndown service. We also experienced friendly and warm guest service during our stays, especially from associates Yvonne, Catherine H, Lily and Stella. The breakfast team manager Edwin Lee and Nina, as well as Executive Chef John Chye and Cai Ling should also be commended for their exemplary service, making for great dining experiences. We also wish to thank the hotel's Executive Asst Manager, Mr Andrew Lee, for reaching out to us during our stay and treating the guests like VIPs.Overall, great value for money. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I opted to stay overnight here with friends and celebrate my birthday. The check in was fast. Our room was neat and tidy, aircon was OK and toiletries are complete. The pool is not heated and its a challenge to dip at night. Infinity pool is overlooking Novena and neighboring towns. Location was a stone throw away from Novena MRT. I did not receive any compliments for my stay during my birthday, compared to other hotel chains. No
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything went very smoothly from check in to check out at the Courtyard Marriot Novena. The room was very clean and had everything one could need, i suggest getting a high floor as the view is spectacular, of course you could just go up to the rooftop bar and infinity pool but nothing beats waking up to the view from your room. The hotel staff were excellent, on my first day i consumed all the water and the hotel put 4 bottles everyday after without me asking. Very kind of them, its the little things. The ground floor staff were very pleasant when leaving and returning to the hotel. The hotel bar is a bit small, the pool isn't to big either but its a fantastic view as it is a infinity pool.Andrew Lee the assistant manager was also very keen to know how the stay was and very supportive. Overall one of the best stays.The location:Its a bit far from the city center but honestly it is next to the underground train which is 15 minutes to the center or a taxi is always available a bit more expensive but even faster. The mall attached to it has two supermarkets, loads of restaurant and everything one could want. Great value for money.The only issue i had was no work desk and i was traveling for business so it was a bit cumbersome to work for hours on a laptop.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Every employee of this hotel gives you a greeting and a smile. I spent 20+days here and was pressed with the hotel. The location is at the Novena MRT which you can access via the medical corridor next door (covered access the whole way). There are so many food options at the shopping malls adjacent to this location that you can find all the variety you want. The hotel rooms are very modern, however, a little small for a long term stay. The pictures online are a great way to see the rooms. The TV is wall mounted and out of the way. The breakfast buffet has a good variety of Chinese, Indian, and western options. Overall this is a friendly hotel, at a great location, that I will retutn to in the future.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: HOTEL staff,Liu Qiong gave us qick & very kind service. The room is clean and comfortable.The view from 33th floor is very nice. There is a shoping mall at where a nice Vagtarian restaurant is located,
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very nice modern hotel in a central location right on the MRT. Good facilities and very clean. They add a 10% service fee and the GST, currently 7% to all charges. Drinks, meals, laundry, anything and everything. The rooms have ironing facilities, a fridge, full bathroom with soap and shampoo etc provided. Complimentary bottled water also provided daily. The rooftop bar is a hidden gem.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I just completed a 7 night stay at the Courtyard in Novena. Overall, the hotel was wonderful. Great service, housekeeping was excellent, nice pool/bar/dining on roof with to die for view. Breakfast was included per my Marriott status and the food was excellent. Location is great with MRT super close. Check in and out was also very good.So why the 4 stars? The room was really small. This was not too bad for me because I was traveling alone but there is no way I could stay there with my husband. The worst part was that there was inadequate space to store my clothes. There were NO drawers other than a tiny drawer in 1 cabinet and open 2 open shelves in the closet. The closet was very small. I know the hotel cannot change the size of the rooms but they can do something about the drawer space. I was forced to somewhat live out of my suitcase for 7 nights which is never fun or efficient. The bathroom is also very open to the rest of the room so if you have 2 people there, privacy is a bit compromised. If I return by myself, I would stay again but I won't be able to if I bring hubby (or anyone else staying with me).
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was clean, modern, and best of any Courtyard in the states. Sky22 restaurant breakfast buffet had plenty of Asian and Western options. Rooftop infinity pool and 24hr fitness center as well. Right next to plenty of shopping and dining options. Front desk (22nd floor), transportation desk (1st floor) were top notch.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great service by front desk- they made it easy to check in and were very open to making our family stay comfortable.Connecting rooms were well set up and the design of the room was open and clean. Love the sliding doors in the room to open up the space.Thanks for a great stay.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 2 nights as stopover. Granted early check-in which was great. Lunch was very reasonably priced on level 22. Close to MRT and lots of local shops. Rooftop infinity pool and bar are "must-visit". Staff are courteous and helpful. Check-in and check-out are easy and present. Top of our list for hotel in Singapore.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel itself is well positioned, connected to a mall (which was connected to another mall) so access to food and shops was great. The mall is also connected to a train (MRT) station which made getting around Singapore a breeze. The room itself was a tad small but I think they made good use of the space. The rooftop pool was divine. The hotel staff were great. Special mention to Jason from housekeeping who went beyond expectations and literally guided us down to the MRT station and helped with the purchase of our tickets and gave a great debrief on places to eat in the morning. Hui Shie at the service desk was super friendly with the offer of a cot to be placed in our room once she saw we had a baby with us. Highly recommend the hotel if you are looking for somewhere with a ton of great amenities and service.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: loved the location. its a new hotel, right next to MRT and two malls. the rooms had great views. especially roof top infinity pool was amazing. The breakfast was pretty decent. It could get crowded as the lobby restaurant is not that big. the roof top restaurant doubles up as a lounge for early evening. Food in the lounge was basic but decent.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my first time at this hotel, and it was a very pleasurable stay. I would highly recommend this hotel. My housekeeper Gui Hua was very thorough and gave excellent service. She was very pleasant to converse with. I also appreciated Jason, the manager of housekeeping, taking the time to chat with me and going the extra mile for me.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are thinking of staying here but picturing a Courtyard in the US stop, because this isn’t that hotel. I stay at Courtyard frequently on business and in my experience they focus on consistency almost to a fault. Walk in to one and you have walked in to most of them, same layout, same design and same services. Great in some respects because you know what to expect but don’t apply that logic here – this is a full service hotel with a Courtyard badge.I stayed for 8 nights in November. No problems checking in at 1:00AM local time. The room was spacious, and very nicely appointed. There was a great large screen TV and a comfortable couch as well. My only two minor complaints were the lack of a proper desk, there was small glass table in front of the couch, and the doors on the bathroom, which can better be characterized as sliding walls. I have seen similar design in other hotels that use barnyard types doors for the bathroom. I was traveling alone so it really didn’t matter but does one ever need a full view of the toilet from the bedroom? Why does the wall slide? I have no idea why walls and doors have fallen out of design favor. Don’t let it stop you though, minor gripe on my side that I don’t like from a design perspective.The hotel has a full restaurant at the lobby level, and again for those from the US, this is not your Courtyard. Full breakfast buffet and restaurant service at other meals. I only had breakfast but the food was excellent, the service was prompt and there was an array of western and eastern choices. I must also mention they have room service. When you fly 24 hours and have your body clock off by 13 hours sometimes the idea of someone bringing your food sounds good. I ordered dinner a couple of times and the service was prompt, 30 minutes at most and the price was reasonable. It was nice to have it as an option. I know it is typical for many hotels but not for a Courtyard.I didn’t get to make much use of either the bar, gym or pool but regardless you should make your way to the roof for spectacular views of Singapore. I went up one afternoon to watch a major storm roll in. My last night I went for a drink at the bar and the view of Singapore was awesome, I have the pictures to prove it. The bar was a bit pricey but reasonable given the location and on the Thursday night I visited the drinks were two for one, making them a bargain. Service was excellent again, very attentive.Great part of all of this was the value. I was originally booked in another hotel where the nightly rate was north of $450 Singapore. Thinking that was excessive I did some research and found this hotel for half the price and it was worth every bit of it. It has only been open for a bit over a year and may age with time but who cares – it isn’t aged now and a great value.I feel like I am being a bit too effusive here but if you travel frequently you understand how pleasant it is to roll the dice on a hotel, so to speak, and be happy with the result. First world problem I suppose but flying 24 hours for a business trip and then staying some place terrible is not much fun. No worries here with this hotel, book it, save some money and be happy.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room is quite tiny, just can fit in all 3 of us with my kid sleep on the sofa (where I took photos from). The breakfast is good and perfect for my Asian stomach. Staffs are nice and professional.Location is quite convenient with the MRT station within 5 mins walk.I would say perfect for couple/business and a bit small for 3 persons even with a small kid.
hotelName:
9    Courtyard by Marriott Singapore Novena
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment was a good size, full cooking facilities. The only item missing was some wine glasses. It’s only a few minutes walk to Robertson Quay, 10 min walk to Clarke Quay, a few minutes walk to the MRT, taxi rank at the door. The staff were friendly, it was clean. Great place will stay there again
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Exceptional because Park Avenue Clemenceau is just 2 min walk to Fort Canin MRT station and Seven eleven store and Cold storage which is just below your appartment.Staff is exceptional especially Front desk staff and KIM old lady .All staff is enthusiastic and greet us with charming face's.Rooms were exceptionally clean and house keeping done on every alternate days.I think Park Avenue Clemenceau is a hidden gem in SingaporeDefinitely we will visit again and will also recommend about Park Avenue Clemenceau to my friend and Relatives.RegardsDr Tejbir SinghDr Gurpreet Singh Dang
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Park Avenue Clemenceau is a great go-to option if you want to have that home away from home vibe when you visit Singapore. It has most of the necessities that you would need for your quick get away stay in Singapore. Very convenient as well as it is within walking distances to MRT (Fort Canning), Bus Stops (Shell HSE), and grocery (UE Square)
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: While the building could do with some updating, particularly in the corridors and living rooms furnishings, it is such a great location near the river with easy walking to many lovely restaurants. It is also not a long walk to most of the tourist locations and has an MRT across the road as well as Fort Canning Park just a two minute walk away. Being in an apartment as opposed to a hotel is great if you are staying for more than a week and the apartments have almost every thing you need. Although the complimentary breakfast isn't that great, it is very easy to purchase items from the supermarket underneath the apartments and supplement what is provided.The staff are lovely and go out of their way to be helpful and courteous.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Needs renovation. Nice central aerea. MRT and bus very close. Clark Quai and other sights not far away. Kitchen wasn't clean. Great Watercooker and washing machine. Poor breakfast without fruits. Rather dark entrance but friendly staff.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is great, staff is very friendly and helpful. Condition of building is average to below average for the price paid. Hallways need to be updated, TV in room does not move so useless unless seated directly in front of it. Sofa furniture is very uncomfortable to sit in for any extended time. Gym is worst I have ever seen.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Park Avenue is very close to the heart of city and is easily accessible by all means of transportation. I liked the clean and quite environment it has and the peaceful surroundings are very serene. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking to stay close to city.PS: It is just 5 mins walking distance to Clark Quay!!
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great rooms with everything you need including washer, dryer and even umbrella. Great location within 15 minute walk to the beautiful Chinatown precinct where the food is amazing and ridiculously cheap. Surrounding local restaurants are priced according to menu and certainly some quality eateries close by.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 8 nights in a 2 bedroom apartment. Great for our family. Bathrooms and kitchen are modern. The rest of the apartment looks dated because of all the woodwork and brown curtains but it was very comfortable, clean and spacious. It was also quiet. Mobile phone is provided which is great and it had an app to buy tickets for various attractions. Prices were cheaper than anywhere else I had looked. Helpful staff. Pool is good and was never busy. Close to heaps of restaurants, supermarket downstairs and MRT close by. Overall good place to stay, especially for families that want a self-contained apartment and some room to move.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Got exactly what we expected when booking. The apartment was large and clean and in a great location. A little dated but comfortable and good value for money. Very safe area close to the river and public transport.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great stay in 2 bedroom apartment. Good kitchenette with all the essentials. Handy to have grocery shop in ue square mall below. Very easy to get to Clark Quay and Robertson Quay. It took us a few days before we discovered the river path connected both.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location ...rooms were very comfortable...staff courteous and friendly ...the breakfast timings ideally should be extended to 10 AM...if possible daily room cleaning services ...also If the housekeeping could clean the dishes during room cleaning ...but overall we had a fabulous stay and value for money
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's located very close to Clarke. Apartment was fully equipped. All basic necessities are available right below the property in U E Square.Handy phone provided by property is very useful Breakfast needs some improvements.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location in Clarke Quay, next door to the MRT station Fort Canning (downtime line) and handy having a 7/11, supermarket and starbucks downstairs. We found taxi drivers would get lost if you asked them to go to the hotel, but we soon learnt to ask to go to the UE Building instead. We stayed on the 11th floor and had no complaints about noise etc. Was very quiet day and night. We used the pool a few times and always found it to be clean. Staff were all very friendly and the breakfast provided on weekdays was a nice touch (food selection not excellent - mainly just pastries, cereal and toast). Bed's were comfortable, showers and bathroom good, air con worked very well but overall we were a bit underwhelmed by the apartment. I'm usually quite easy to please but I just expected some nicer finishes as the pictures online show an open plan apartment with adjoining kitchen, rug in the living room etc. Our apartment was nothing like this. It was very bare, uncomfortable couches and the kitchen was in a tiny room tucked away. Our fridge had a bad fish smell to it and i noticed the mattress provided in the baby cot was moldy. The apartment itself had a bit of an old musty smell to it.Would I stay here again? Yes, probably. As mentioned earlier, location was good and the price was excellent for a 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of the city.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing location, courteous staff, good rooms ... What else you require.... Highly recommended place to stay .. currently me in my stay duration at the apartment... Till now awesome experience at the place... Thanks Michelle for helping me while booking this place
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here March 2019. Great location and services. Buses travelling both ways on Clemenceau and River Valley Rd. The MRT is on the diagonal corner for great connectivity. There is also a taxi stand at the facility. The pool was very refreshing and well utilised. Apartments are well equipped and anything missing is soon provided if requested.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An absolutely great hotel in the heart of things in Singapore - any day better than chosing a regular hotel room. Has all the space and comfort of an apartment and the service of a good hotel. Superb fre breakfast, free handy local phone with free local/international calling and internet and the best deals on all Singapore shopping, sight seeing and food. Very friendly and efficient staff
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable apartment with good location and pool. Easy to travel around the town because MRT station and buses were close to the hotel. Food store and 7 eleven in the same building. The pool was clean and peaceful.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything perfect! MRT is so close, perfect location. I stayed here already five times and almost 4 months in total. It started to feel like home. Thanks for everything and I will return again for sure.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Highly rate this hotel for its location. 5 mins from MRT Fort Canning which is on the popular downtown line. Only few stops away from Sentosa. 8 min walk to Clark Quay. Downstairs there was supermarket, pharmacy, 7-11, coffee shops, bar, cafe/bakery and Starbucks. Room was clean, functional and maintained well. Breakfast was baked goods, breads, cereal, boiled eggs, oats, buns, and porridge. We didn’t find our room noisy - didn’t hear street traffic or our neighbours. Didn’t get a chance to use the pool but looked clean. Staff were helpful. Definitely would recommend this place.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the property is very goodNearest MRT (Fort Canning is 200-300 mtrs) away, that connects to rest of the Singapore very easilyRoom cleanliness needs to be improvedMore vegetarian options should be included in breakfastRoom service is not available at the property
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay was very good overall. The complimentary breakfast choices and quality was very good. Location was very convenient with the supermarket right next to us. Just a few minor things that bothered us1. Perhaps our flat (2 story 4 bedroom) wasn't used as often, it wasn't cleaned thoroughly when we arrived. The stairs were quite dusty2. There was only 1 unit of hair dryer in the big flat, definitely not enough for all of us to use3. The shower stall door doesn't shut properly, so water keeps on leaking out 4. Perhaps the flat is quite old, the induction stove top heats up very very slowly. Taking up much more time than usual induction tops.The staffs were very friendly and polite, we will definitely return for a stay again!
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Maybe 100 yards from Fort Canning MRT. 2 mins walk south from the Fort Canning MRT towards the Singapore River, there are a number of cafes, clubs and restaurants, most open till 1 am and prefect place for night life.Shell HSE Bus Stop 1 min walk from the Hotel Entrance GateHop in Hop off from Duck and Hippo Tour available from the Bus Stop opposite to the Hotel (Stop is called Oppo. Shell HSE)Take 123/143 to reach SentosaTaxi Stand next to Starbucks...take SGD 8 to 10 to reach Gardens by the Bay, Little India, VivoCity, Botanical Gardens, Orchard Street, Bugis Street, etc. Taxi from the stands are cheaper than GrabCar....UE Mall (in the same premises) as the hotel has Seven Eleven, Cold Storage (supermarket), Starbucks, a number of restaurants, even a specialty wine place, etcBreakfast has a variety of breads (didn't count but around 7-8 sweet breads and 3-4 savory breads), eggs, oats and porridge. The rooms are quite spacious. Large enough for 2. Has awesome city view. Has washing machine/ dyer, microwave, oven, toaster, kettle, pans, cutlery, etc. Other than cooking ingredients, the kitchen was everything one needs, Even dish machine liquid and sponge, kitchen towel, etc were available.We stayed here for 7 daysWill highly recommend to everyone - couples and family with children
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Friendly and helpful staff, convenient location next to Robertson Quay and Clark Quay. Outside of ERP zone, easy to get taxis. Value for money.Breakfast is simple but there’s a bunch of proper cafes downstairs.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 8 nights in a 2 bedroom apartment. 2 adults and 2 children. We were pleasantly surprised to find 2 single beds in the second room even though our booking on Agoda had only advertised one bed. It was spacious for what is usually available in Singapore. 2 bathrooms although big step into bath tub for one of them.Made use of the combination washer dryer almost every day but it does take a long time to dry and can only handle small load to dry.Stove and microwave available but only limited cookware. But the Hawker food centres are so cheap that we didn't really need to make use of it.Very close to Fort Canning MRT. Just around the corner. Close enough that using MRT from airport is feasible even with luggage (only 1 change of line needed). Note children under 7 travel free, but as a tourist, 7 and over is full fare (but still very cheap anyway). Chinatown is 1 station away. Copious cheap food options there. Pool was great and hardly used in January. In room smartphone with free unlimited 4G internet and free calls to some countries. It is basically modified android interface. Can act as wifi hot spot for your own phone. Need to download hotspot app as access to settings menu limited. A bit fiddly as I found hot spot would activate but as soon as you activated screen again it would turn off. Best to turn it on then leave it in bag untouched for rest of day. Great battery meant hot spot could last all day. Good as it has proprietary charger (not USB). Breakfast actually surprisingly good. Numerous pastries, toast, muffins, congee, cereals, tea, coffee, boiled eggs. Not available Sat or Sun. Cold Storage supermarket underneath apartments open till 10pm each night. But expensive compared to Australia. Overall. Very happy. Excellent location.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Close to Fort Canning MRT and Clarke Quay. Friendly and helpful staff at any time of day or night. Room was clean and tidy. Beds comfortable. Beautiful views. Aircon worked perfectly. 2 bathrooms, which made showering easy. Breakfast could be improved. Poor choices available for Singapore. Supermarket and 7 eleven downstairs. All over a great place to stay. I would go back.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms were clean and comfortable. Nice and close to the Fort Canning MRT (a 2min walk) and also located right next door to a shopping centre which had a supermarket in there if you ever wanted to grab something. We stayed on level 11 which had a beautiful view of Clarke Quay. The buffet breakfast offered on weekdays was good. We also made use of the outdoor swimming pool. Would definitely recommend!
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is perfect, it is in such a perfect location, heaps of restaurants of all nationality are within very close walking distance. The hotel is centrally located to all areas of Singapore and due to the taxi stop for the UE building, everyone (Grab drivers and taxi) knows where it is. The hotel room was perfect for us, we were in a 2 bedroom/ 2 bathroom suite and it was ample size, the fact that both showers were able to be used at the same time with no interruption to pressure or hot water was perfect. We were lucky enough to check in early which was a perfect but had we have not been able to we could have left our bags and visited one of the many restaurants in the area. There is a convenience store (7/11) on the ground floor which is also perfect for that quick drink or snack (Ben & Jerry's). The rooms are extremely clean and serviced every second day, breakfast is provided for free on a Mon-Fri, It is not fancy but certainly plenty of choice. I would most certainly recommend this hotel to others and stay again the next time we are in Singapore
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location close to subway and city centre. Clean and quiet rooms, super service in all respects. Swimming pool clean and popular, used vevery day.We had only positive experience during the one week stay.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in this hotel for 8 night with our 3 kids (8, 6, 1.5)Everything was perfect, starting from the apartment that was big, clean and pleasant The staff was very kind and helpful - with lots of tips and patient We can't forget the old and funny guy singing - old McDonald had a farm.... Location is very good!!Amazing value for money
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, close to MRT, breakfast on weekdays was a bonus, staff very friendly and helpful, apartment was perfect for our needs, the ‘handy’ phone was another excellent bonus which proved to be very handy indeed. Great to have the supermarket and 7-11 close at hand for my teenage son with his ravenous appetite. Highly recommend staying here and would happily stay here if I ever make it back to Singapore. Loved the view from our apartment of the river, Clarke Quay and Marina Bay Sands Internet access not really available in the room, but works in the foyer area, and nice to have a break from being so internet dependent anyway.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have become very fond of apartment hotels for the extra space and amenities they provide. Park Avenue provides good, clean, apartments at a reasonable tariff. A reasonable breakfast is provided on weekdays (included in the price). The location is exceptional with easy access to Clark Quay, Robertson Quay and Fort Canning Park (with its own MRT station). The staff were very attentive and helpful. A small maintenance issue was dealt with within 30 minutes. We spent a very enjoyable week here and would definitely return.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was wonderful having the extra room offered by an apartment and the location, so close to Clarke Quay and Fort Canning MRT Station. The staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast was basic but sufficient. There is also a 7 eleven, pharmacy and supermarket in the building.The bed was too close to the window for me to get into bed without crawling from the end of the bed and there was no bedside table. The shower was in a bathtub which was a little high to get in and out of. There was a little mould around the edges of the tub. The washer/dryer was convenient but it had issues with the door opening after finishing its cycles so we had to call the maintenance guy who was there immediately. A label on the hot water switch “hot water do not turn off” would be handy!
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good place at a great location! Near Clark quay, supermarket, MRT, taxi stand and View on the river from my apartment. Staff is very nice and helpful, special thanks to Manjula and Ika! I recommend.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a fortnight in a suite in this hotel in September while visiting family in Singapore. Our suite had a good kitchen, a small lounge-dining room, a double bedroom and bathroom. A particular grumble - the shower was over a bath, so that you had to clamber into and out of a bath to use it, neither easy nor safe at our age, particularly given the disablitit of one of our partnership. Whikle the decore was a little tired the hotel is well appointed - it has a lovely pool area, provides a light breakfast included in the cost and is close to a metro station and to Clarke and Robertson Quays; Orchard Road is about a twenty minute walk away. Overall adeqaute accommodation with the option of self catering in a very pleasant part of Singapore.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a great location, close to many bars and restaurants and the MRT. Hotel is on top of a small mall with supermarket. One-bedroom apartment is pretty big with fully equipped kitchen (fridge, microwave, stove top,..) and living area, separate bedroom. There is also a washer-dryer, iron, safe and free wifi (although it doesn't work as well when you are not on your floor). Cleaning is every other day and there is a free breakfast on weekdays. Room is ok, but bathroom could use an upgrade. It was also a bit of a challenge getting in and out of the shower/tub as it is quite high.Good gym and nice pool, although there are not enough sun loungers and umbrellas.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our first trip to Singapore and we couldn’t be happy with our stay at Park Avenue Clemenceau. An ideal price, 2 minutes walking distance to Fort Canning MRT and Clarke Quay were just some of the great reasons to stay here. The rooms lack in updated facilities but they made up for that in space which helped us having small kids needing to play. The pool is great for adults but not ideal for toddlers and there is a free continental breakfast on weekdays which did the job. It is also located on top of a small shopping center called UE Square which most taxi drivers knew of. Staff were always friendly.I give it a 5.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really enjoyed our stay. Rooms are spacious and have washing machine. We had two bathrooms. Made good use of free mobile phone in our room to book our day trips and for international calls. Close to Clarke Quay, MRT, shopping mall.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, walking distance to the Clarke Quay, with a stroll along the river. Getting to the hotel from the closest MRT at Fort Canning is easy with the directions provided.Check in is simple straight forward and efficient. We stayed in a 1 Bedroom apartment on the 5th floor, overlooking the river and Clarke Quay. The breakfast has a good selection of sweets and pastries, with porridge’s, cereals, brotchens and dumplings. Fresh fruit juices, teas and coffee. The suites are serviced every other day during the week. The suite is comfortable and cool with airconditioners, a welcome after a balmy walk around town sightseeing.There is a 7 Eleven on the ground floor of the UE Square, and upstairs is the local supermarket, Cold Storage.Enjoyed a relaxed stay for the week of the F1GP
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved our stay here! Great apartment two bedrooms, two bathrooms, very spacious. washing machine was awesome to have. The mobile phone provided with wifi for when you are out and about came in very handy at times. Staff are very friendly and welcoming. centrally located right opposite Fort Canning MRT. Sad to have to leave
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic Hotel with great location Service was excellent Pool and breakfast also goodThe house keeping frequency was too lowWe were 5 people (a couple with 3 kids) and the room/apartment matched all our needs
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel never fails to satisfy me..The room is always clean and spotless.. the stuff is so friendly and helpful.. we would always go back here, first choice in singapore..The location is superb, its very convinient, everything we need is nearby.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Two minutes walk to MRT station, convenience store downstairs, and Liang Court (shops and food court) across the street. Super convenient location! Weekday breakfast is average. Room was comfortable but we had a bit of traffic noise at night.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My Family and I stayed here in April for 12nights and were very impressed! Check in was very fast and as we arrived at midnight with 3 young children it was nice to get to our room very quick. The room was great large enough to not feel cramped even with 5 of us. Cleaners were very nice and did a great job. The breakfast was excellent! Now just keep in mind it is a continental breakfast that is free of charge, so obviously not the range you get with a full buffet breakfast, but more than enough to fill the tummy before a full day of exploring and like I said it was free. Pool was very nice, we were normally the only people using it which was great. It was just across from MRT. A grocery shop was in the same complex, which was great.Clarke quay was a short stroll away and lots of place to eat nearby. All in all there were a couple of small things like carpet frayed and little things like that, but nothing that impacts a great stay.Thank to every one at Park avenue Clemenceau.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found this apartment great. Location, close to a Fort Canning Station and the river, at Robertson Quay. Convenience of Cold Storage, Seven Eleven and restaurants in the same building. Staff were all very helpful. While possibly needing some refurbishment it was clean and well equiped.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: UE Square is awesome location very close to MRT, Buses and Taxi Rank. Well equipped supermarket down stairs. 2 Min walk to Singapore River river where there is plenty of atmosphere and restaurants. Just a 5 min walk to Liang Court (awesome food) where there is a massive Japanese supermarket in the basement. Right next door is Clarke Quay. Awesome place to eat, drink and enjoy. 15 min walk to Raffles City where the Level 3 Food Court is awesome.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment was a fair size but was very dirty with wallpaper peeling off the walls.After complaining we were able to swap rooms to a cleaner apartment.the cleanliness of the apartment was poor but the apartment was OK. Overall, all it needed was a deep clean and redecorating
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pleasant experiences, good staff and very supportive, need to increase vegetarian options in the breakfast and also make it available on Saturday and Sunday.Location of the hotel was very apt for travel purpose
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed for a month in June/July 2016 in a 2 bedroom apartment. The management was very supportive and caring during our stay, as we had come to Singapore for a medical procedure. We really enjoyed the hotel, service & location! The Manager Mr. Eddie Chan, and Assitant Manager Ms. Christine were very caring, and the entire hotel staff was very friendly. The rooms are spacious, as a 2 bedroom apartment included dining table, lounge with sofas, fully functioning kitchen. There were also 2 bathrooms in the apartment, making it comfortable for everyone. Hotel also includes a 24 hours gym, which was very comfortable for me, as well as a pool.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 2 weeks in a comfortable 1 bedroom apartment in February. The bedroom is large enough to easily fit a rollaway. The large wardrobes as well as the kitchen cupboards provide ample storage. Excellent location near Clarke Quay and Roberson Quay with their restaurants and entertainment.Breakfast is included, but rather limited: some hard boiled eggs and no real bread, only toasted. Lots of sweet pastry though.Very friendly staff, and checkout time can be negotiated.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cons: 1) The entire shower must be re-modeled. There is a serious design flaw as water leaks from the shower every time you take one. We had to use towels in the floor and by the shower curtains to prevent the leaking. 2) Shower water pressure is weak, even though there are three settings in the hand-held shower head. And the water heater could not handle two people showering back to back. Water often got tepid to cold after baby bath and an adult shower. 3) Breakfast is poor. Quite embarassing, actually. No real choices, and lots of stale, leftover pastries. They should not offer it at all if that is the best they can do. It is already only offered Monday to Friday (not on public holidays and weekends) 4) It would be great to have trained staff there 24/7 like any other hotel. We arrived on Christmas Day, and there was no trained receptionist at all at the desk. They left a staff who was clearly not a trained receptionist, who fumbled through the paperwork for check in. The same happened when we were checking out on a Saturday. The same untrained staff member checked us out, and couldn’t offer any help with three large suitcases, which my wife and I had to drag along with a baby in stroller. 5) the apartment’s phone never worked and they could not really fix it. Pros: The location is superb, and the suite is quite a big space for Singapore. The staff was attentive, though a couple of times we had to ask twice for things. the Handy Phone was nice and it gave the opportunity to be in touch with my family when I was at work. The cleaning staff was AMAZING!
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for four nights in a 1 bedroom apartment. Place was spotless, nice layout and comfortable bed. There`s a complimentary smart type phone, that`s loaded with maps & vouchers, as well as free calls to 10 odd countries (nice touch). As mentioned in previous reviews there`s a supermarket (& restaurants,cafes and 7/11) in the building below, a taxi stand on one side street and bus stop out front. The location is handy to Clarke Quay, China town and Orchard Rd.Breakfast was included but with so many places to eat in Singapore we ventured out each morning. All staff we dealt with during our stay were friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There're lots of good places such as Singapore river, good restaurants.If you like jogging, you can pop by Singapore river and fort canning.They offered good breakfast and room cleaning service every 2 days.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place for families with two kids, great location and very friendly staff greeting you with a smile. Many attractions are very close. Easy to get taxis or use public transportation. We really enjoyed our stay over there. Thanks.
hotelName:
10    Park Avenue Clemenceau
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the only hotel I always stay when I visit Singapore, location is great and service is even better.rooms are clean, it also have restaurant and bar downstairs which is very convenient. All staff are excellent!!
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As usual, the staff like Hamid and Maureen always exceed my expectations. My fav hotel to always stay in for quick, relaxing staycation. Thank u and u strongly recommend them!:)Rooms are spacious, location is strategic, food options are plentiful, staff are very accommodating.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed at the Aqueen Heritage Joo Chiat twice now for business and the staff have made the experience very pleasant both times. The rooms aren't very large and some are without windows, as in quite a few hotels in Singapore, but Mr.Hamid was very helpful in upgrading my room to one with multiple windows and remembered me from one stay to the next, with almost a year in between.Particularly noteworthy is also Mr. Louis Leong, who after I forgot some clothing items went through a lot of trouble on his personal time to return them to me, and was extremely courteous and helpful throughout.I'll gladly stay here again for my next trip.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful, especially Mr Hamid and his crewMr. En Jun and Miss Syahindah. The place is clean, room was a bit small but it was not expensive. Breakfast bar downstairs serves nice, inexpensive western and Asian style food. Can definitely recommend this place, I know we will be back, when coming to Singapore.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: AQueen Heritage Joo Chiat. Great location away from the hustle of the main city area. Near many of the well preserved old shophouses. Very close to the Geyland Seri New Market which has a great food hall on the 1st level. AQueen is a good modern hotel, clean and comfortable, good staff who are very helpful. Our room although on the small side was well appointed, lots of power points and light switches, good shower. Hotel security was good. A great spot away for the main tourist locations. Would definitely go back to this hotel again when next In Singapore
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel and Hamid, the receptionist was also excellent. The price and the location was good, 2 bottle of water every day. It was clean and auiet! Hamid helped me lot, and he was very kind. Thank you!
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was compact but very clean and well laid out with a great walk in shower.The gentleman on reception was so courteous and welcoming nothing was too much trouble, he is an asset to the hotel. It's a little bit on the outskirts but a 15 minute walk gets you to the Metro.The same Metro card works on the buses too.There are lots of restaurants and convenience stores close by.The room is cleaned spotless every day.Look out for the use of switches to indicate if you want the room cleaned or do not disturb. Its easy to switch by mistake and then wonder why the room hasn't been attended to!There is a safe free to use.There is a restaurant attached for breakfast and lunch, with a pool table, but we only used it the once.Good security using the room card to activate the lift.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I frequently travel to Singapore for work and always choose to stay at Aqueen Hotel. The location is great for me, and I'd estimate my stays to be well over 15 occasions. Each time, I'm greeted with friendly welcoming smiles by Mr Hamid, and all the staff are very helpful and accommodating. Aqueen has now become my "home away from home". The rooms are simple, clean, well equipped and have very good aircon. Perfect for the business traveler. The location is also easy to access to and from Changi airport.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is our first business trip to Singapore, and we are unexpected to have such a great hospitality from Hamid as we are back from a sunny walk and he served us the drink. This is a little kind action yet it is an unforgettable moment to us. Good job!
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would say that I have visited Singapore many a times and this was my best stay with aqueen heritage hotel on joo chait road. The hospitality is amazing, they are very prompt if you need anything. The rooms are huge and very clean and maintain the standard for a 4 star hotel. I would recommend this hotel to all who are looking for a budget stay. This hotel is located at most fesable location close to super market,restaurants, mrt,and many more.I would like to stay again with them once I visit Singapore. Manager Hamid is accommodating and looks after the guest very well.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very warm welcome from Hamid when we arrived. Unfortunately, that was the only day we saw him during our stay. The hotel is about a 20 minute walk to the convenient Eunos MRT station. Enroute there, Geylang Serai Market offers great food. The hotel room was small but adequate and clean. The bottled water and fridge are excellent amenities. Our room was above the hotel front entrance. Unfortunately, we heard many night conversations when guests (?) stood outside to talk. Also, we had some loud talking, door slamming neighbors on our floor. The hotel had no control over these minor inconveniences; therefore, we did not complain. I would not hesitate to stay here again. Thank you Hamid and Louie. On the side, we took a taxi (vs the very convenient/efficient MRT) to the airport for an early morning departure. It only took about 20mins. What was interesting was that the meter gave us one price and with a flick of the driver's wrist, a higher price registered on the meter. Not sure if this is acceptable or not given there was no mention of a flat airport transportation rate when we got into the taxi.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am a regular visitor to Singapore and nearly always stay at the Aqueen Joo Chiat. It offers one of the best combinations of value, price and room in town, and is located in a quiet neighborhood, yet convenient to many major Singapore destinations. The front desk team led by Mr Hamid provides excellent service and support for matters relating to the room and help in town. You cannot go wrong by staying at this hotel
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for three nights February 2019 and found the desk staff very friendly and eager to help. A short walk to the MTR (Paya Lebar) with plenty of coffee shops and eateries on the way and the location made a nice change from the harbour and Orchard Road areas.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here on the 5&6 and felt the peranakan ambiance at the hotel with a cozy room and comfortable bed. Easy to move around as the MRT and bus stop is nearby. Lots of eateries and Gelang Serai Market is a 5 minute walk away. The staffs are friendly and helpful especially the Hotel manager Mr. Ivan Loh made us felt welcome and important. Will definitely stay here again on our next visit and would highly recommend people to stay here....
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff is so friendly and absolutely helpful.Also it is clean and love the atmosphere.The hotel is trategically placed so you are near to delicious food stalls and supermarkets etc.I will definitely reccommend to anyone whether from United States etc.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a lovely surprise: booked through a third-party website but our check-in experience was quick and easy (enough though it was 1 AM). The lobby always has lemongrass incense going which I loved.The sleeping room itself was very small, but we didn't spend much time there and it was fine for two people. The bed was extremely comfortable and we slept VERY well. The little bathroom has a terrific shower, and the room amenities (fridge, hot water kettle) were great. The room also has plenty of outlets and places to charge devices.Loved the area: we found a great place with a few delicious food stalls for breakfast, the grocery store and 7/11 were right next to the hotel, and we could easily walk to a bus stop or train station to get around the city. We were probably a 30 minute ride away from everything we wanted to see and do, but I'd still stay there again. The neighborhood is quiet and feels extremely safe.
hotelName:
11    Aqueen Heritage Hotel Joo Chiat
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my 2nd time staying at this hotel. Rooms are very clean and staff are friendly and helpful. One of the statff - Mr Hamid is always polite, great mannerism and respectful.I highly recommend this hotel - especially if you want to be in a great location with delicious local food along with good transportation to the CBD area.
hotelName:
