And our ceiling was leaking, BUT their service is incredibly efficient that right after I called reception, maintenance appeared. They also don't replace the coffee and tea and toiletries so better get your own. Their breakfast is a little dissapointing but you could always cook in your apartment. The kitchen is well equipped.Also! Their free shuttle service is available every hour which is incredibly convenient for people who just want to use the MRT. And you can always get a cab from the reception if you don't want.All in all, would definitely come back here.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: its the best and ideally located place on orchard road, the heart of singapore , although little away from MRT , shuttle service too and fro from hotel is a good option, It is very spacious , neat and clean and quite place, house keeping is excellent, Taxi service is very quick and place has all the basic amenities
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Singapore is an expensive city, we all know that. But when I checked into Le Grouve service apartment my opinion changes.A very specious apartment ( now a days it is impossible to get in Singapore ), excellent services, every hour bus service to important stops, neat and clean, friendly staffs, 10minutes walk to Orchard road, free wifi, land phones are free to call any Singapore numbers, which includes cell numbers too. More mope importantly the price is very attractive. I have decided whenever I plan to visit Singapore I will stay at Le Grouve Service Apartment.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really enjoyed staying at Le grove. It is my first experience staying in an apartment in Singapore, and is a great alternative to the Grand Hyatt, St regis or Hilton. The location is fantastic. With apartment selling prices being very expensive in this area, having the experience of a one week stay in your own orchard apartment is surreal. We shop for groceries, we cook, all that things singaporean residents normally do and we love it! The size of the living room is huge, the bedrooms are of generous sizes, and although this is a dated property you can still see the luxury touches. There is the shuttle that will take you to a few central locations for free, and if you are an active person (I am not) you will enjoy the walks under big trees to orchard. My wife certainly enjoyed her morning runs to the botanical gardens. I enjoy listening to her stories while having salmon for breakfast.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hello friends i know you all trust me and would read this at first it looks like a very good place to be in.i went with my family and my motherthe price which is confirmed on a booking, they charge you more than that, since i was with my old mother and family i had no option but to check in and pay the extra damage But when you stay there forget that you will get any soaps or body wash or anything for your hygiene. so even though you decide on going there take everything that you have.there is breakfast but no eggs at allif you ask for any services , they are loud and answers will compel you not to ask another question, else you may be in troubleThe locker in the room doesn't work and they open automatically so very risky to take any valuables what so everthe place has a different sting and stink which cannot be explained.i would strongly not recommend this place to any of my friends reading this.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this is my first time to stay in Le Grove. we stay for 5 days. with 2 bathroom. large living room. but some of the tv channel can't watch.Nice pool, friendly reception and security staff. near to orchard road. you can walk 10 minutes and near to supermarket in orchard hotel. Le Grove also have shuttle bus to orchard every hour.I recommend to you guys to stay here :)
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After researching accommodation in Singapore, we decided on this one mainly because of the price and location. Hotels in Singapore are so expensive, so this one was a nice surprise given that it was in the Orchard Road district which we wanted, but wasn't as expensive because it was a 10 minute walk from the main road. We didn't find this a problem though because there was a free shuttle that stopped at numerous places. And with a young family, this was exactly what we needed. Then shuttle service does end early though (about 7pm) but this was a sacrifice we were willing to take considering how much cheaper this place was. The interior is fine, wooden floors, air conditioning, kitchen, laundry. The floor space is more than ample. We had a 2 bedroom apartment. The only thing I could say is the ensuite bathroom's shower was not hot enough, didn't have enough water pressure and the bath you had to stand in for showering was narrow so it wasn't great. We ended up using the main bathroom. There's free included breakfast which ended quite early at 9.30. It was a little disappointing, selection wise, but it's complimentary, so we were happy with whatever we got. It had pastries, toast, tea, coffee, juices, a few cereals and fruit. The pool was also a nice surprise but sadly we didn't have a lot of free time for the kids to enjoy it. It was a large pool and has a spaIf we go back to Singapore, I wouldn't mind staying here again if we were trying to save some money!
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My Mother, unfortunately, requires a lot of medical proceedures as well as health check-ups and follow-ups. This requires our family to visit Singapore very regularly. Over the years I have stayed in quite a few hotels for the shorter visits. But for the longer ones, it is silly to stay at a hotel. So for the last 2 proceedures, we have been staying at Le Grove. Not only is the location ideal, the fascilities are remarkable too. The staff is helpful and efficient. The rooms are spacious and comfortable.It is located on an off shoot road from one end of Orchard. It is equipped with a pool, a gym and a sauna. The rooms are very spacious with decent sized kitches that are fully equipped, living spaces and rooms. Although they have a very minimalist breakfast spread, it is healthy and efficient, especially if you are on the go and do not have time to use the kitchen in the morning. However they do not serve breakfast during the weekend. There is a phone at the recpetion that helps you call a taxi, even when the reception is closed in the evening. They also provide a shuttle service to and from points all over Orchard Road and others. If you dont want to cook, you can always have food delivered. Le Grove has a reserve of good and typical takeout contact info, but with wifi in each apartment, you can look that up yourself. If you are planning on staying in Singapore for a long time and have medical visits to make, this is the most comfortable and relaxing place you can opt to stay in.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 8 nights over xmas in a two bedroom apartment with a rollaway for 5th adult. Plenty of room for extra bed in lounge room. Second bedroom adequate for 2 adult males. Great beds throughout and with 2 bathrooms no waiting. Compact kitchen with an initial supply of tea, coffee etc. Furniture all clean and comfortable. with added bonus of washer/dryer in kitchen making stay very comfortable. Plenty of room throughout so that the 5 of us had space. Great pool never crowded when we were there although I suspect the place was full. Only used the breakfast thing one time due to weekends and public holiday closure adequate and busy but you could do your own in your apartment if you wanted more than a continental type breakfast. Handy to Orchard Rd, we didn't use the shuttle preferring to walk out and then catch a cheap taxi home in the evenings. Free wifi was an added bonus for the necessary email catch up. All in all highly recommend as an alternative to a hotel when price comparing to multiple hotel rooms.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I checked here in middle of month and Rouen this place very nice, quiet and clean. I am very comfortable and enjoying my stay here. It is located in centre of city and very near to orchard road. 10 min walk to orchard road Main Street. Excellent choice.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment we stayed in was just the right size for a family of four. It was clean, and for us it was easy and quick to get to since we were on the ground floor. The breakfast they is simple but limited so I suggest either buying your own food (the apartments have a lovely kitchen) or going to the cafes on Orchard Rd. which is only a short walk away. They also offer a shuttle bus which can bring you to the main locations in town.
hotelName:
26    Le Grove Serviced Apartments
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is spacious, facility inside room is complete, except there is no washing machine. The staffs are kind and helpful. There is a water dispenser in every floor. The location is strategic, easy to find food just right across the building, nearby convinience stores. Walking distance to 5 MRT stations: Dhoby Ghaut, Little India, Rochor, Bencoolen, and Bras Basah.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this location for a week. I couldnt face being stuck in another cramped hotel room. My colleagues also had an apartment.I was thrilled on arrival at the standard of my apartment, a true home for home. - more modern student living rather than luxury but perfectly acceptable and comfortable. I even had a seperate lounge that my team could use as a mission control office during the day . Eveything was clean and a good standard. Serviced daily, great laundry service, strong wifi and fantastic customer service. Bed was superbly comfortable and there were many charging points throughout the apatment. The team were always happy to help me with any questions. This was a perfect location for us for downtown Singapore. It was also great to have a mall opposite with plenty of places to grab a bite to eat and a Starbucks !
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Air-cons leaking, room stinks, old renovated, night time no duty manager and poor service. What kind of 4 star hotel? I book this room for my Friend, last night when we back to hotel and the air-con leaking, floor and table many water, call the front desk and told us night time no staff. Tomorrow then complain. What kind of service for a 4 star hotel? The room was so stinks and it was so old. Not recommended hotel. :(
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location wise superb. Everything is accessible. Train bus and taxi all in reach. Everything is just so walakable e.g. orchard street, little india, bugis junction. Lot 7 11 nearby and lot of eatries nearby as well including veg food I stayed in 1 bhk which is pretty big in size. Bed and bed room is bit small but living room is huge. Kitchen is big as well.Breakfast on weekedays is decent spread.you will find two veg optiona as well. Dont know why they dont serve on weekends.Staff is really sweet.its clean but budget service apartments
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I stayed in the hotel for my another round of doctor visits at Singapore General Hospital. Location wise, it’s not that close to SGH but with Grab you can reach everywhere at reasonable cost. Our booking didn’t include breakfast, but we have food panda for delivery, so it wasn’t really a big problem. The apartment was a decent size, they have about everything for an apartment, except washing machine and rice cooker (rice kinda important for us ;)). It has a queen size bed and a sofa bed.In front of the hotel there’s Starbucks and some restaurants. Across the street there’s a fruit stall that we always bought fruits at reasonable price, a 7-11 store and a convenient store.The nearest MRT station is Bencoolen, about 550 meters and some of the path were not covered.It’s a nice hotel apartment, but actually with the same price we can find other hotel apartment with more amenities and larger size.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, staff was decent, polite and very co-operative, excellent services, best for family as well as individual stay, it was truly a value for money, overall it was a very pleasant stay.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Was a great stay all around. Would stay again. The room was fully equipped with everything we needed in the kitchen, they gave us a room with a bathtub upon request, we were taken very well care of without it feeling overbearing. Really was a great stay. Will come back.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I want to go to Singapore again！　And I also want to stay at this hotel. Hotel location is the best. And staff is very well！I was comfortable.Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore is a great hotel for sightseeing in Singapore.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here with our one year old and had a fantastic time. The one bedroom apartment was spacious, clean and well equipped (including the kitchen!). Staff were really accommodating, attentive and helpful. They even gave us a 3pm checkout on our day of departure to allow our little one to nap.The hotel is equidistant to 3 mrt stations and has a huge number of local eateries around it. We would highly recommend the hotel to anyone but especially those with children.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family of four stayed 7 nights recently in the 2BR apartment (1BR executive & 1 connecting studio) on level 10 and we really enjoyed our stay here and will certainly return. The apartment is clean, spacious, and comfortable. Housekeeping was courteous , did a great job and we only had to request housekeeping twice even though they are able to do it daily for our 7 nights stay. Staff at the reception are very friendly. The gentlemen who helped us booked a taxi upon checkout to Sentosa on 2nd April was exceptional but a pity I didn’t had a good look at his name tag. We found it a fairly easy walk to Dhoby Ghaut MRT station and there’s plenty of eateries around. For snacks, I will highly recommend Rochor Original Beancurd on Short St which is literally just opposite the apartment building. Beancurd is the silkiest and best I’ve ever tasted. Love the Yakun Toast at the POMO centre near Kaplan for breakfast. Along the same stretch on Selegie Road you’ll find NTUC Fairpress (mini mart) and Watsons (toiletries/medicinal etc) . If you crave local hawker food , you can walk about 7 mins to Albert Centre Market for really cheap food or head to Bugis Junction for more shopping and eating!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Citadines for 11 months so it became a home away from home. The room (one bed) met my needs and the location was very convenient. I found the front desk staff to be very helpful and welcoming (a particular thank you to Elijah Ooi) which made the place feel like home. The staff were accommodating in relation to requests and any issues were dealt with quickly. I would certainly stay there again whether for short or long stay.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family of three stayed here from Monday to Friday. Taking all things into consideration, I have to said it is satisfactory. The hotel staffs were accommodating and allowed us early check in and late check out. There was daily housekeeping (change of sheets every other day). Breakfast might not be fantastic but it was adequate, and main courses varies everyday. The sofa bed in the room was very comfortable. However, my only complaint is the queen size bed. It was narrow and slightly sink in to the middle. It was very difficult for two persons to sleep in. I ended up sleeping with my daughter on the sofa bed instead. But as a whole, I will still recommend it.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was an amazing stay with the family. Rooms were great spacious. Break fast was good too. My kids enjoyed. Only missing was play area. Location is good in the prime area. Room service was good as well. Thank you Citadines.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Citadines is a short walk from train stations (Rocher being closest and easily connects underground to other lines), shopping at Bugis and Orchard road (1-2 stops or 15-20 min walk).Weekday breakfast has great variety. Coffee lounge open 7days. Little gym is very convenient. Staff very friendly and overLl nice and quiet but central!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are looking for alternative choice apart from standard hotel room, this is better choice.It's in a good location. The studio apartment is spacious, clean, comfortable bed and comes with kitchenette.However, the Internet WiFi speed at times are slow in the evening.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a studio which was spacious, clean and quiet. The couch in the sitting area was comfortable and the kitchen had everything you could want. There is free cold water available outside the lift areaThe view from our studio was great
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great service apartment in a good location with only a short walk to MRT stations. Apartment Apartment was clean and spacious and the beds were very comfortable. Included breakfast on weekdays was a bonus. It was nice to have a separate living, sleeping area and kitchen. The shower was large and bright due to a big window. The lobby had a nice modern feel and also loved the fresh aromatherapy fragrance. The wi-fi service was good and very much needed during our stay.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great apartment in a good location with only a short walk to MRT stations. Stayed here as a family of four with two children (aged 6 and 9). Apartment was clean and spacious and the beds were very comfortable. Included breakfast on weekdays was a bonus
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked to stay here for 3 nights and needed to extend for another night and the staff were very accommodating in allowing us to stay in the same room at the same price.We were on the 12th floor and had 270 degree views of the Singapore skyline. The studio executive apartment was spacious and modern. It was nice to have a separate living, sleeping area and kitchen. The shower was large and bright due to a big window. The lobby had a nice modern feel and also loved the fresh aromatherapy fragrance. The wi-fi service was good and very much needed during our stay.Location was pretty good with a less than 10 minute walk to Dhoby Ghaut MRT station. A few convenience stores, restaurants and bars are close by.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just started my stay here and the room looks good on the surface but once you start looking further into the room you can see it could do with a lot of updates to bring it up to date.I like the location and the bed is very firm which I really like.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very satisfied with this hotel, accessible to everything (a few minutes walk to the MRT, restaurants, shops). We arrived a few hours early for our check-in and since our room was not yet available, we decided to go around first and the staff, who were very friendly, allowed us to leave our luggage with them first so we don't have to bring them going around. When we returned, still early for our check-in, we were informed that our room was ready so we were allowed to go up already to freshen up. The room was very homey, clean, and complete with everything that we needed. I would definitely go back here.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is near to Little India mrt. Just 5-minute walk. In front of the hotel, there are some shops/restaurants (starbucks!, etc), halal food of kebabs and malay restaurant 'Hanis'. So far using mrt is easier compare to bus.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have been staying there for more than 6months, it almost like a second home and have met so many different people from different locations across the world. location is good as it closing 5 MRT lines out of 7. Food per say you don't have to worry as Little India and other food streets are close by. CBD is also 2 stops away from Dhoby Ghaut. Near to Benconloon do Downtown and Telok Ayar are also 10 min MRT ride. Breakfast is good, as Veg people also get good options here.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really,hotels is very nice and is on good location and there staff service is too good We appreciate to Shobina,she is really friendly and helping natureLocation is too good and neatest to thr MRT station and more convientAnd all things to near by the hotelThanks Citadines hotel team Singapore
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Near bus & MRT stations. Very close to convenience stores, as well. More importantly, there's a Starbucks nearby :-)It's a serviced apartment & not a hotel so don't expect a 5-star service but it's still good. The lobby is not very spacious but well appointed with plenty of seats. Front desk is very accommodating. You can rent a pocket-wifi from the front desk on a daily basis.Check-in was a breeze. The ride up to the rooms (6F) were quick. Carpeted & well-lit hallways. There's an outdoor area where you can catch some fresh air. Free filtered for the guests, no need to buy bottled ones.The room was spacious, 1 big bed & 1 sofa bed. A/C was in good condition. Free internet in the rooms. Cable TV. A functional kitchenette with complete amenities: water boiler, electric stove, microwave, fridge, utensils, plates, glasses, sink, & even soap & sponge for washing the dishes. Also in the room: iron with ironing board, safe, hangers, & other wardrobe stuff.Toilet & bath were a bit small compared to other hotels but I didn't mind. Water pressure & heater were good. Standard kits were provided. Bathroom sink was located just outside the T&B door. My toilet didn't have a bidet (room 607, fyi Citadines) but our other room had, just my luck :-(Overall, a great place when visiting Singapore. I would, definitely, go back. Recommended.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time at Citadines Mount Sophia but it was as expected. We have stayed in Ascott/Citadines serviced apartments in Saigon and Tokyo. Great value and the staff do really care about you.Mount Sophia was half way between Little India and Chinatown and not far from Orchard Road. We really do enjoy our stays in Singapore (normally about 3 days) but this time, it was fantastic. Thank you all at Mount Sophia.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we enjoyed of our stay at Citadines Mount Sophia in Singapore. very good location we just walked to most of places even to Singapore flyer just 25 minutes walk. close to little India that you can find very cheap price food (if you like Asian food). and very nice personnel working there.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s only walk distance from Dhoby Ghaut station and Bencoolen station, restaurants and convenience stores are also nearby. A/C in my room is a bit loud, but it’s ok, the only thing that a bit annoying me is kids from neighborhood are so loud at midnight even there is a quiet environment policy after 11pm at this hotel.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is very convenient. Generous room size.Have fitness center, no swimming pool.Poorly maintained, the shower head is leaking and cannot adjust the angle.Cannot adjust the position of the TV. The TV set in our room have a blackened portion, about 25% of the screen.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were travelling in a group of 3 adults, and the first impression for us was "Wow the room is very spacious, even with the 3 of us!".The room was cleaned and our amenities was restocked everyday. The staffs and the room service attendants were all very accomodating. Even oven, sink, plates, cutlery were all provided in the room. Really feels like home!I didn't buy the breakfast package as we always buy and eat our breakfast at Hanis; at the Wilkie Edge Mall just beside the hotel. Hanis has a wide variety of menus for breakfast, lunch, even dinner! If you are planning to stay for 3 adults and more with minimum of 3 nights stay, you should consider stay in Citadines Mount Sophia!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this apartment hotel in Dec 1st week..location is fantastic as it's very close to orchard road and Little India. You can grab a taxi at any time of day or night just outside the hotel. It also has small eating joints just next to hotel for light refreshments as well as Chinese meal (If u r fond of that).Rooms are comfortable with queen size bed and one sofa bed, so effectively three people can stay easily..hotel staff is very helpful..hotel also serves breakfast on weekdays with pretty nice spread to cater for all needs..overall stay is worth the money spend here ..
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would recommend this apart-hotel without reservations. Firstly, the amount of space available in an apart-hotel generally will be a lot more than a typical hotel in Singapore. If you're traveling in a group of 4 or more, it makes more sense to go with an apart-hotel.Citadines Mount Sophia was amazing! The location was perfect! They did special decorations for my daughter's birthday with a cake and didn't even charge anything additional for it. I found that to be an awesome gesture. The cleaners have a great attitude. The cleanliness is top notch. I couldn't fault this place if I wanted to. Great experience!Tip: if you're using a taxi, tell them you want to go to "Wilkie Edge" rather than Citadines Mount Sophia. They seem to recognize the place by that name (as does Google Maps).
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Citadines for 4 nights in a two bedroom apartment.The hotel is adequate for a stay and has 3 MRT stations nearby. With the closest one being Little India just a short 5 min walk. Bencoolen is probably another 5 or Dhoby Gaut, 10 minutes walk.It's also closeish to the top of Orchard Road whuch is about 10 minutes walk away although you might not want to walk that far in the heat. Little India is also closeby in walking distance.There's nothing fancy with the rooms, they are very basic. Thankfully well equipped with AC although the units looked wee bit old. The master bedroom has an ensuite which was good as i ended up having my own bathroom to myself!The rooms were tidyed each day which was nice. But some of the cleaning lacked a but detail as i found hairs on the bathroom floor on the day we moved in.The staff were very helpful and great with advice which we really appreciated.I would recommend this hotel as a decent place to stayas long as you don't come in with high expectations.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my 3rd stay this year. Service and cleanliness remains good and consistent. The team at reception were always helpful and accommodating. I usually stay no less than 4 nights and loved the common laundrette so i can do my laundry (tokens are chargeable). Breakfast is simple considering this is a serviced apartment and not a hotel. But again the property is surrounded with good eateries. It is located away from the main road so noise was a minimum. The studio room comes with a fully equipped pantry and microwave. Though i think the tv needs to be changed to a 40 inch at least. Overall i enjoyed my stay yet again...
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice stay, comfortable, good staff and very helfut helpful. Would like to visit again if get opportunities.Nice surprise on my birthday.Recommend: yesDevelopment: required for the sercices on weekends
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The review goes as below:- Location : 5/5 - 5-7min walking distance from MRTs( Becoolen, Little India, Rocher)- Rooms - 4/5 - Apart from a dripping AC (which was fixed promptly), rooms were spacious and very well equipped (fully functional kitchenette)- Breakfast - The spread and food quality remained pretty standard and satisfactory - Front office - Front office and support staff was very helpful and gleefully attended the patrons.(Special mention for Shobina, who was adept at sorting any issues)I stayed at Citadines for an entire month and shall recommend it to business travelers and tourists alike
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I were very happy with the Citadines Mt Sophia 1 bedroom apartment we stayed in whilst on a stopover in Singapore. It was well lit, spacious, very comfortable and close to transport options. The kitchen provided adequate resources to enable us to prepare simple meals - important to us because of food intolerances.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great staff-very welcoming, efficient and professional. Always willing to help if your driver gets lost, or you need to scan/print documents or lock yourself out of your room. They go above and beyond their responsibilities to provide great service. Housekeeping is great at keeping your room clean and respecting your property. Wonderful selection of free breakfast and a free shuttle that takes touches down to Fullerton!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Space is a luxury in Singapore. But in Citadines you are given this for an affordable price. Plus in every room, amenities are found, like comfortable beds and pillows, ref, airconditioner, cookwares and electric stove, hot and cold showers in a clean bathroom.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After looking and looking for accommodation in Singapore we found Citadines.The unit was self contained, small lounge room and sleep8ng area.This was twice the size of all the other hotels we investigated.Walking distance to Bugis markets. Plenty or food courts, restaurants, shopping centres.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location...handy to Orchard Road...The MRT St is nearby which connects you to every part of Singapore. Rooms are awesome and large. Staff are extremely friendly and courteous. No question was too much for them to give you the time to answer. Highly recommended. If I ever return to Singapore this is where I will be staying again!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this place because i thought breakfast and handy mobile phone were included. I was wrong. The receptionist said free breakfast is only given when you book through their website. I used Booking.com. We had executive 2 bedroom suite for 3 adults and a toddler, and upon checking the space, there was no handy mobile phone. I called the receptionist. She said they dont have it anymore and suggested instead to rent their pocketwifi instead for SGD8+ a day. Cut off is every 12 noon. Such a dismay on my part.We stayed for three days. Checked in on the 18th. On the 19th of noon i rented the pocketwifi and returned on the 21st before noon. Shabila, the receptionist asked for a 3day payment to which i calmly explained that it should only be 2 days. She made computations again or that's what i thought and after awhile billed me the right amount of 2 days only, of course.Overall our stay was pleasant. My mother, my niece and my toddler son loved the space.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very good apart hotel. Rooms are very big nice and clean. Wi-fi is fast.breakfast not lavish but all essentials.views are good.staff is helpful.and its difficult to get a room this size in singapore at this price point. Highly recommended.location is very perfect.Only downside is not serving breakfast on weekends which is very peculiar.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location was very good. Rooms were spacious, neat and clean. Staff was polite and helpful. I missed a swimming pool though.Overall we enjoyed our stay here. Would recommend this place without any second thought.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my second stay at Citadines Mount Sophia, the first was in 2010 and had a good stay back then. Was looking forward to my second stay during the recent F1 period but had a terrible check-in experience. I was served by Jeeve, the Assistant Manager of the property. Despite my explanation that I will be doing the check-in on the behalf of my friend who will be arriving later at night(I had my photo ID, credit card which serves as a guarantee and original booking confirmation), I was treated rudely. Citadines should look into this matter & employees should improve on their customer service skills.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We (4 adults) stayed for 5 nights. Our stay was during the grand prix, so we didn't have many choices for a 2 bedroom apartment with a reasonable price point. Originally we booked a two bedroom apartment but at check in we were given two rooms (studio and a one bedroom) with a connecting door. This set up was really great for our two couples. We each had our own kitchen, bathroom and living area.The apartments were clean and tidy. Bedding was good (especially the pillows- I took my own but actually preferred the hotel ones!) Decent air conditioning was appreciated with temperatures around 30 degrees C and very humid outside.We didn't really use the hotel facilities so can't comment but the communal areas we saw were clean and inviting.The location was good. Close to Little India and Rochor stations and many others. We used the MRT a lot, but also used the Grab app for taxis from the hotel at times too. Walking distance to Orchard road too.The hotel staff were friendly and helpful as well.Overall a great place to base yourself for a stay in Singapore. We'd definitely stay again.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a seamless experience at Citadines. The lovely check in staff upgraded us to two interconnectable rooms when our 2 bedroom appartments we had booked had some issues. Both rooms were spacious, very clean and had all the facilities we needed. Located near MRT's and easy taxi access - we also enjoyed the availability of the food stalls nearby.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I have been in Singapore for 7 years before we relocated again and we checked many options before choosing Citadines. The one bedroom apartment is spacious, it’s quite, the bedroom has good blinds so it’s dark during day time. The location is good with food and coffee places around, the metro is nearby. Overall good confortable spacious at the right location. I tried the shuttle in the morning to go to Galaxis and this worked fine. The Gym, quite nice and spacious.What I didn’t quite like:The breakfast, I felt more like a cantine.The pillows, bulky and now very soft.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is located centrally to all places of interest , Apartment is nice and comfortable. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Lots of restaurants in the vicinity . If I am back to Singapore will definately stay with Citadines again.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We're arrived on 16 Aug 2018, at around 12:30pm, and been asked to wait for about 15 minutes for room cleaning. I can understand it, since we're too early arriving at the apt. Everything just went smoothly for registration process and room preparation. We're at 12th floor toward Middle Rd, nice view. Room cleaning & amenities replacement done everyday. Nearest MRT was just about 500 meters. Overall It was very pleasure and delightful 3 night stay, and really worth for the money. Couldn't ask for more.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Family of 3 adults - We stayed at the Citadines Mt. Sophia self coontained Studio for 6 nts, which was very comfortable. One of the cleanest Hotels we've stayed in. Cleaners do a superb job. It was 7 mins walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut MRT & a 5 mins cab ride to the Orchard Road main Shopping Plaza. Make sure you add Breakfast to your accom. booking price- it is worth it - Buffet B'Fast is very good. 24/7 Desk Staff were always very helpful & friendly, especially Darmadi & Elijah. Thank you so much for being always of great help to us.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Citadines Mount Sophia in Singapore for six nights and we were very satisfied with it.We loved the very large room, the kitchenette where we coould have the breakfast we liked better in the morning and the view.The only problem we had was the noisy AC.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in a two bedroom apartment, it actually had one room with a double bed, another with a single bed and there was a sofa-bed in the living room. Space is adequate, kitchenette is fully equipped. Close to everything you need. Orchard and Little India a strident walk away. Several Bars and a superb Red House restaurant right on your doorstep at Prinsep St. Breakfast options ranging from Starbucks to local delights like Kaya Toast a few steps away.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have recently spent 8 nights there and was really happy with the overall service especially from Jayvee, Elijah from Reception and Shirley from Housekeeping. Requests were promptly attended to and location is convenient to public transport.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Polite staffs, nice and clean room, convenient location (near restaurants, shops, malls, MRT station, bus station).Large room. Kitchen in the room with enough amenity. Good view to street. Very easy to take taxi, grab car.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 5 nights at the Citadines for our first visit to Singapore and it was great for us. Fab location, clean and modern! We stayed in a studio with a double bed and sofa bed which was perfect for our family of 4.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: At first I was little worried about my booking but when reached it was just perfect and filled my expectation.It was very quiet and the location was not bad. Only thing that it’s missing was a swimming pool
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thanks to all the staffs for the facilities given during our stay. it was a decent stay. service apartments are clean and spacious. Decent breakfast and gym. The place is near to most of the tourist places and situated in the happening place in Singapore.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found Citadines apartments online and weren’t really sure what to expect. We wanted an inexpensive self contained apartment as we knew we would be so busy with doing all that Singapore had to offer and wouldn’t spend much time in the room. Although small (we expected that!), the apartment had way more room than some that my friends had told me about and was great for our family of four. Our kids shared a sofa bed and there was a divider to seperate the rooms. The sofa bed wasn’t huge but our kids are 10 and 12 and tall and coped with minimal arguing!! The bathroom was clean, the shower huge and the kitchen great for preparing breakfast and other snacks. The fitness centre was great and the location of the hotel was central and we could even walk to lots of places!!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayef for 4 nights with our little family here.It was fun and lovelyI loke the surrounding its complete with lots of resto, small shops, cafe, as well as nerby mrt anx bus station.The surrounding is warm enough yet still in the city as its not in the middle of hectic cold town.Great hospitality and beautiful interior.We also easy to do our own laundry and big space appartment .The price are also reasonable with the facilities we got. Will for sure be here if we visit sing again.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel in a very great location close to everything. Staff is very courteous. Nice place for family short stay . We went for our family vacation. Very good tasty breakfast. Although the property doesn’t have a pool but atleast they allow to use the pool on nearby sister property.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic place to stay. Very clean, spacious, comfortable apartment and wonderful friendly and efficient staff. I would thoroughly recommend this to any person travelling for business or for pleasure in Singapore. It was handy to Little India, many restaurants and cafe's yet still quiet and peaceful inside.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place was fantastic, I would absolutely stay here the next time I visit Singapore again. VERY friendly staff, extremely tidy with everything in great working order. Wonderful location, very close to two MRT stations.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect for family and couples if you are looking for a home away from your home. Citadines Mount Sophia exceeded my expectations in all departments be it the quality of stay, comfort, staff hospitality or location. I would love to stay again whenever I visit again.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed very much the stay in Citadines, we initially doubted because the price but it was worth. Ver comfortable, large enough, clean and excellent services at lobby and housekeeping. Ideal also to visit most Singapur attractions ¡, some at walking distance.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for one weekend before Easter.The rooms are ok. Not fully updated. You might see that they have been used. A populare place I do guess.It is convienent to have two bedrooms and bathrooms, livingroom and a little kitchen. The rooms are cleaned three times each week. That is ok if you know when. We recomend this place.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for a month while I was working in Singapore. Couldn’t fault the apartments;• The room was a great size and fully equipped.• Location is ideal• Staff friendly, diligent and helpful• Breakfast is varied and always hits the spot• Gym has everything you need • Complimentary bus to CBD has 2 convenient times in the morning and always on time• Any issues or feedback is dealt with efficiently and in a timely manner.• Pool of sister hotel can be used and is a short walk awayI will recommend this place to all friends and colleagues who are travelling through Singapore.Thank you team.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is good, most of the city sightseeing sites within feet distance! Four MRT around and 24 hours supermarket named “fair price” is just opposite the road. You won’t regret to the location! It would be better if the apartment get a swimming pool!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was spacious and suitable for traveling parents with children because they provided sofa bed as well. Very high speed free wifi. Overall it was very convenient and we really enjoyed our stayed.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2 nights after a cruise. Clean, comfortable, studio with fridge. What sets this place aside is the helpfulness of the staff. When our travel company changed our arrangements we needed to print new documents out and the reception staff were really helpful. Breakfast buffet is adequate, but not extensive. On the edge of Little India District and lots of restaurants within a few minutes walk. Would definitely stay again.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 8 nights in early Jan.Despite some hiccups upon checking which was promptly resolved by the manager we were also pleased that he had our airconditioner serviced and a dehumidifier sent to our apartment without us asking when we mentioned that the apartment felt damp (rainy season in Singapore). Staff were pleasant and helpful and went out of their way to locate a phone charger that we left behind upon checking out.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: i went to Singapore with my daughter and she'll stay ther for tho months, so i can visit the town with a lot of facilities,MRT is very nearly. Orchard road with a lot of shops is reaching in ten min by feet.we found food very good in few minutes.marina bay and the promenade is very nearly.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with my family for 1 week in this apartment, very nice and clean rooms. The people at the front desk were very helpful. Provided guidance for all the attractions and also helped in booking taxi whenever needed.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: - Lacking in suppliesWe booked for 4 people through Expedia, which advertised the 2 bedroom suite as having a Queen Bed and Twin Bed. Instead, there is a queen bed, single bed and sofa bed, and you have to call reception to have the sofa bed set up. Bottles of water are only provided on the day of check-in, and they expect you to refill the bottles from the water cooler near the lifts, which was on the other end of the hotel from our suite, through hot, open hallway areas.Even though the hotel is advertised as having complimentary breakfast/breakfast included, we were told that we were not entitled to complimentary breakfast.Whenever supplies were replenished, they were not sufficient for the number of people. We always had to ask for extra supplies. It was also only upon leaving that we were informed that there was a complimentary coffee machine in the lobby.- Lacking in serviceAfter a certain time, guards from a hired security company, not technically hotel staff, are manning the reception, and they are not very willing to help. After asking for supplies one night, the second time we tried to call reception, they had put hold music in place to avoid answering. We had to personally go downstairs to ask for things. We were told to just raise any queries at reception in the morning - but it's generally after coming back to the hotel at night that you require things. There is also no cleaner available and no access to any cleaning supplies at night apparently, because we came back one day to a dead cockroach in the lounge/dining, and while the guards picked it up, they did not clean the stain it left because 'we are not cleaners'. Pics attached.We only stayed 5 nights but one day there was an electricity shutdown and one day the wi-fi was cut off. - Lacking in cleanlinessHousekeeping is not daily. Aside from the above cockroach incident, we found spiders *twice* in the ensuite bathroom. After getting back to our room one night, we found that apparently the cleaner had left a tile at the base of the bathtub open. Pics attached.- Good Location Next to a small food centre and some dining establishments. Since breakfast was not included for us, at least we could have it just across the road. Not far from Orchard Road. Walking distance to Bencoolen and Dhoby Ghaut MRT stations, very useful for getting around Singapore.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is great.very central. 10 minute walk to Orchard road. Lots of food joints are nearby.We had a 2 bed apartment and a studio apartment. We had requested for a early check in. They gave us the studio apartment at 9.00 am. The lady at the check in told us we would have to pay an additional charges for early check in but then agreed we had asked for early check in while booking the p;ace.The apartment is comfortable beds are good. but the toilets are not that great.Needs an overhaul.Staff is courteous. but the reception people are not very friendly
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was here from 23 to 28th December on Christmas vacation. This is a lovely apartment which includes all amenities. The staff was really helpful, gave us all directions to all places we wanted to visit. The apartment was cleaned almost everyday. The breakfast was really good. Location of the hotel is the very advantages, close to most of the popular attractions. Had microwave, cutlery, fridge, toaster, locker, nice cupboards, sofa etc. There is Tea & Coffee available in the Kitchen, Staff is very friendly and very advisable. Mr. Rasheed the manager very nice person. Ideal apartment for a family stay. Defeneitly my next stay will be here without any doubt. Thank you Citadines less
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: were there on family vacation for 4 days 5 nights and the stay made it memorable. location of the hotel is the advantage, had microwave, cutlery, mini fridge, toaster, locker, nice cupboards, sofa etc are available in apart hotel style. staff are very friendly and good breakfast facility available. would suggest and recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my wife stayed at a one-bedroom Citadines Mount Sophia for a week in December 2017. The room facilities are good, with a small living room and dining table with a complete kitchen. The location is quite strategic, within the same walking distance to Plaza Singapura and Bugis Junction. Right across the apartment also available many good restaurants and cafe.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great service and amenities. Friendly staff. Loved the location which was close to public transport, restaurants, salons and shopping areas. The free shuttle bus service for office in the morning was an added bonus!
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Place was pretty cosy. The main living room was a little smaller than I expected but the master bedroom was spacious. Bathroom was a little squeeze and smaller than I thought but it’s great that there’s a bathtub. Room appeared quite clean too.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Choosing Citadines by ascot sommerset to stay coz of brand and location, but the actual condition is the worst services. On the first time we arrive no greetings at all from the staff, no offering services, event we look at the lift our self to located our room until we check out early morning, No Smile No Greetings. Arrived in the room seems quite good on living room minimalis with macthing color schemed. Bed Room, hmmm small queen bed, filthy carpet seem never been shampo for long time. The Towels well is fair condition. Same case from other comment at tripadvisor The AC in bed room is to cold. i think they put to big AC size with only 12sqm room size. During stay, surprisingly they will charged for any requested additional item even cleaning our paid daily room charged. Our room not being clean on last our stay, and they only bring the clean towels, bed sheet, blanket without services when we complained. This is not fair to the guest, we paid daily 4 night but only got room clean service 2 times. The guest is have right to have services what they paid. This is our first and last stay.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 5 days at citadines mount Sophia , and honestly it was a very good one , I didn't face any problem .in fact the staff were very helpful .I would really recomand it .I would like to stay on the same place whenever I'm in Singapore .
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a perfect stay very well made property the service the food the ambience staff everything is perfect.I would recommend if you go to Singapore please stay once in CMSPerfect for all sorts of trip
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If not for the housekeeping, I would have rated it excellent. Staff were courteous and helpful and a special housekeeping request was also acceded to. However, I was greeted with strands of pubic hair on the floor (not mine) upon arrival which actually spoilt my stay. My guess is that there is not enough manpower to go around.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I found the staff at the Citadines Mount Sophia to be very helpful and friendly. The room was great, had everything you need and expect in an apartment. The breakfast buffet had lots of choice and was very nice. It is in a great location close to food courts, restaurants and shopping centres.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff at Citadines Mount Sophia are simply awesome. They went above and beyond in every instance we interacted with them and could not have been more helpful. I would come back here just to visit the staff!We stayed for 3 nights with my wife 1 month old, and the room we booked was perfect for our needs. It was more of a small apartment than a room and the kitchen was great for our needs.Way better than having a hotel room and I enjoyed the breakfasts as well. The general location is good, with both local and international food places in close proximity.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very convenient since it's close to the mrt and bus stops. There are also a lot of restaurants near the place so you don't have to go far to find a place to eat. The staff are really accomodating and so are the cleaning staff.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Its an apartment Hotel located a little bit away from Orchard, but the area is very accesible and convenient. restaurants and shopping areas allover the place. Rooms are large and clean. Lobby of the hotel is big and wide. No restaurant inside the Hotel. Price is affordable for Singapore !
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent place..very clean and spacious place...better than any hotel room. Reception staff very helpful. Great if early check-in possible. Breakfast was very good too..it would be super if breakfast could have been available on weekends also.
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: By itself the property is very good. ➕✔️Spacious room - even the simple studio.✔️Good price - lower than average with breakfast included.✔️Good and welcoming stuff✔️You can do the laundry and dry it (10 dollars per laundry and drying) ➖✔️Strong smell from sewage system. Have no idea why but it was very strong, especially when air con is off.✔️Frowsy air - you can’t open windows in the studio and the air con looks like wasn’t being serviced for a long time)✔️They clean rooms only three days a week (but you may ask to change towels and clean trash bins everyday though)So, make your choice)
hotelName:
27    Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is not a regular hostel, it offers small "room" (enclave), divided by curtain and folding door. You can lock the door from inside only. Overall, the place is very clean with sufficient toilet and bathroom. The aircond is installed in the common area in between the enclave, and there is fan provided in each enclave. There are only 4-5 enclaves in a room (security code required for access).
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great stay at BLANC INN. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. The staff was very friendly . The overall ambience was nice and cozy. Met some amazing people. Great place for solo travelers.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Faizal is friendly and patient in explaining the procedure of check in to us upon our arrival.The hostel is basic but clean, comfortable and recommended for the travellers who are looking for the budget hostel. The location is good as surrounded with hawker food center, MRT station, 7-11 and convenient shops.Thank you, Faizal and Blanc In.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is nice and clean with nearest public transportation but went night it bit noises from another guest And hope in the future their door can lock from outside because went go out atleast must lock in cabinet
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the blanc inn for three nights with our 18 month old toddler. It was such a nice time there. The staff was always asking if everything is ok and always helpful with questions and advises. The blanc is is very clean and the showers are also very good. You will find a water dispenser with hot and cold water as well as coffee and milk powder in the sitting room and every is good Wifi access. Definitely worth a second visit
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a very good choice.Staffs are very cooperative .You can have free coffe and tea.you can have cheap meals from next door resturant,quality is also very good.you can have free Wi-Fi.over all I felt like home.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is near all conveniences that around 8 minutes walking by Lavender MRT.Faizal are friendly and always supports what we want. There are a lot of restaurants. If I have another opportunity in Singapore, Blanc Inn may be the first choice for me.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the room and the kitchen and bathroom area was very clean. the location safe, lots of restaurants around.amazing coffee shop in front of the hostel with a very delicious breakfast. thanks Mdm LG for hosting us :)
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is near all conveniences and fit my budget. Faizal and Mdm LG really kept the place clean. There is even a Tibetan temple around the corner for photo opportunities. There is good air circulation due to the high ceiling.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place. Clean and mostly quiet. Faizal and mdm LG were both fantastic and very helpful. There seems to be plenty of showers and toilets. Close to pretty much everything you could want to get to. Very walkable
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here with my family for 5 days. Faisal was very helpful and patient in handling all the queries but this place is only suitable for individuals.Cons:(reason for giving 3 star)1. Breakfast should be provided.2. Bedsheets and quielt should be replaced everyday which was not done even once in whole 5 days.3. Rooms should be cleaned/ broomed once a day.4. Quiet place to stay if your neighbors follow the hostel rules which was of course not followed.5. Should have provided atleast one fridge for guests. Only one fridge was present atvreception and that too was locked at evening and unlocked at 9 am in morning.Pros:1. Entrance to hostel and rooms are via electronic locks, hence no manual intervention is required.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is very comfortable even need used shared bathroom. The most important the staffs are very friendly, Faizal very helpful give us information how to use the facilities and what the attraction in Singapore. Maybe can improve the security which is to lock the personal room from outside too. Currently, Personal room only can lock from inside. I really recommend for those want experiences stay in budget hotel (backpackers) and when you go visit Singapore you must stay here @Blanc Inn.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I didn’t realise when I booked that it was like sleeping in a dorm, but with your own door.The room was super small - literally a bed, fan, safe, light - and just about enough room to lie down my suitcase. It was very clean. The showers and seating area at the back of the building were all really nice. The staff were super friendly, although not always around.Lots of restaurants etc around.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is very comfortable, the staffs are friendly Faizal have very pleasing personality. The place is clean through the hardworking staff Rio I really recommend that when you go visit Singapore you must stay here @Blanc Inn. Also, it is budget friendly.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice place to stay if you are looking for a hostel with your own private room. Service was good, place really good and clean, the room that I ordered was big and comfortable as well. Definitely will come back here again.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The check-in, stay and check-out were all smooth. The receptionist Faizal was helpful and thoughtful. When I had to leave my luggage for a few hours after checking out, he helped me keep my stuff in a secured place including air drying my towel. Such great initiative. Great stay!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: ✔️Cleanliness✔️Accessibility✔️Friendly Staff✔️Suits on tight budget travel✔️Discount on attractionsthank you Faisal for your warmth welcome during our stay. surely we will be back soon. God Speed!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff take care and very nice. Location is very good near food court (open 24 hour) , mrt Lavender station (walk about 5 minutes) and Mustafa shopping center (walk about 10 minutes) . Very comfortable and clean.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: each times i go in Singapore i use this small nice place : the welcome(this times from Mr Tommy) and quality are constantly very good.food court is nearby with a huge choice , the place is also very quite
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My first experience at a boutique hostel, first time stay at an alcove and how damn good it was. First things first, the hostel is located at a convenient location. Hardly 400 m to Bendemeer MRT(Downtown line) and 700 m from Lavender MRT (East-West Line). It is also at extreme proximity to Jalan Besar and Little India. The passcode concept was completely new to me, and i found it to be extremely convenient and useful. Though the bathroom was shared, it was neat and tidy. The hot water plus the coffee powder was a big boon for caffeine addict like me. I cannot help but mention Faizal, the caretaker there. Faizal was outstanding help throughout my stay there and even helped me keep the luggage in a safe even after checking out. All in all a big thumbs up to Blanc Inn, i would love to come back there for my next business trip.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very clean, comfortable, the internet is fast, the bed is very good, the attendant Faizal is very helpful and gives advice on where to go, where to eat and has discount for the main attractions of the city. I'll be back for sure.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was pleasant stay. Thanks for the kindness of Mr. Faizal :)Room was not big but enough for be based on heart of the city.Lavender is very convenient location. There are amazing local restaurants around.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is still awesome.The alcove is spotless clean. Pillows and comforter are soft, cool and fluffy.Pantry is well maintained and clean.Late check in is very convenient and easy.Faisal is always cheerful to assist.After a long hours of tour, the place is comfotable and cosy to relax.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel and alcovens were clean. Faizal at reception gave me good advice for my Singapore trip. Late check-in by myself worked without any problems. I was one day late because I missed a fligth, but the hostel still kept my reservation :)Really good connection with MRT (Lavender MRT Green line, Bendemeer MRT Downtown line)
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms (basic) and facilities were as described and clean. And yes, Mr Tommy and Faizal were helpful as well as very accommodating. I will definitely return with my family with kids ranging from 4 to 17!!!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are very clean and well maintained. Staff Faizal was very helpful. Two parkings available outside this hotel.Shared bathrooms. Food stalls are closerby. Seven11 was near too. So we topup our autopass card.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my second time to go Blanc Inn, I got the very same great hospitality from LG and Faizal. being 4 nights at this inn, this place offers free ammenities which you needed like soap, shampoo, and several drinks! Looking forwards to stay in here again!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my second visit to this inn.The location is very strategic (near lavender mrt and near mustafa market). And the location is kind of in the center of all must go places in Singapore.The room is also very comfy and cozy.Faizal and Mdm LG are also very very nice.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Though Singapore has quite cost effective for food and groceries, the accommodation is more expensive. With this in mind, Blanc Inn is on the cost effective scale of accommodation. The receptionists Faizal and Mdm LG were friendly and helpful (they lent me an umbrella when I went out one day), and the rooms are clean.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a room for 5 people, arriving from Changi after the reception was closed (18:00) but the late check-in process worked perfectly- make sure you let them know if you might be late! Our room had a double bed in one part, separated with a curtain from the other part with three single beds- the room was clean, beds were comfortable; the AC worked really well, there were two electronic safes and a lockable cupboard. Faizal and Mdm LG were really friendly and helpful throughout our 7 night stay. Overall, we were delighted with our stay at Blanc Inn.Other good points: (1) free supply of hot/chilled drinking water and tea coffee; (2) really convenient 7-eleven and food court within 100m; (3) secure room to store luggage after we checked out, and able to use the showers in the evening before heading back to Changi airportLess good points: (1) rooms aren't anywhere near soundproof, so you can be disturbed by other guests - ear plugs are available for sale at reception! But you can have that problem anywhere.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You might laugh when you see how small these rooms are, but don't panic: the service is friendly, the hostel is clean, the beds are comfortable, and the temperature is good, too (cold enough to be pleasant, in summer). Can't complain about this place, especially given how hard it is to find affordable accommodations in Singapore.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a room for three people and they upgraded our room when we got there which is nice. The place is nice, clean, near seven eleven and you can reach MRT or bus by couple minutes walk. The staffs are friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are suitable to everyone (for single, twin and family room) Security of inn is awesome. Aside from CCTV, doors are equipped by codes that no one can enter.Locations : accessible to any places..MRT is just near. Just walk a couple of minutes. Food stalls and convenience stores are just near in the Inn.Amenities : shared bathroom are well organized and well clean. The dining table and living room is feeling relaxed.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a room for 5 people and stayed for 2 days. It was a great trip. The room is very clean and cute but there is no restroom inside of the room, we need to use public bathroom downstair but they were clean and hot water. It's near 7/11, Farrer Park MRT and food court as well. Specially, the staffs are very friendly and helpful. A female staff was so nice to show me way to mrt as well as provide us a localcity map. The guy help me to take a taxi, carry the luggages for us. I'll absolutely come back again when I visit Singapore many next times :)
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Functional, utilitarian. Perfect for solo travelers who need a comfortable bed to sleep at night and will be out all day. If you stay in, you may feel a bit claustrophobic. Faisal and Mdm LG are both really helpful and friendly people and took good care of everything.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Blanc Inn for 3 nights and we enjoyed every moment of it. The room is very comfortable and clean. Blanc Inn's location is great, not even a minute walk to a 711 and food courts. The bus stop and MRT Station is really close, it made travelling a lot easier. Also the Staff (Faizal and LG) is very kind and helpful. Overall, very happy and would love to visit again!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am too old for hostel but here having a separate room worked perfect for me. The room was clean, shared bathroom also very clean and I was really comfortable using it. There are several showers in case it is used by other people at the same time. The only down side is that room does not lock. But there is a locker and safe in the room so it is not big problem. A/C worked well, WiFi was strong. Location is great, close to Little India and MRT station. Staff (Faizal and Peggy) were extremely friendly and helpful with tips and recommendations. I stayed 3 nights was lucky to meet both of them. I am not a person who sleeps in hostels but Singapore is expensive and I had to compromise. This place was far much better than some other hotels i have stayed during my 7 weeks travel in Asia. I am happy with my choice and would stay here again. This place changed my opinion about hostels.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfy, clean and safe place to rest your head. Too old for backpackers but similar idea without sharing a room. Bathroom and toilet facilities were suffice. Lavender train station was in walking distance. Very happy and all part of my plan to do Singapore on a budget
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Book this place very last minute as this hostel is the only one with reasonable price across SG during Coldplay weekend. I booked a single alcove of which comfortable and clean. You get more space than a regular hostel with the same price. The only downside is I got a very noisy neighbor of which a classic problem in most hostel.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very basic hostel. Friends jokingly called it our "large soft sleeper" like a train sleeper. The "room"/"alcove" is basically a mattress sized room. Very small. Not really all that private. Bath shared with many. Some days good, some days bad. Lots of noise 2 nights from large party that arrived. Very helpful front desk. Close to subway.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room was basic but bed confortable and cleanSharing facilities (shower and toilets) for single roomCommon area with tea and coffee facilitiesVery good location on line to Singapore City Center and AirportWithin walking distance from large choice of local restaurants and coffee shopsStaff very helpful and accommodating ( i came across Peggy most of the time and she gave me great information about the area and how to go around)
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room is clean and not smelly. The staff is Awesome (always engage with Faizal every visit). Faizal is a great staff and very kind. Help us even after we checkout. The facilities are adorable. All i need is there. Surely will come again !
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were greeted by Fizal. He showed us around, let us cool off our beverages in their mini fridge, and always had a smile on his face. Comfortable beds, nice area to hang out, and 3 blocks to the subway.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is walking distance from MRT Station. 7-11 is next door. The room is extra clean, fastest WiFi compare to other hostels even few hotel I stayed in before. The toilet/bathroom are super clean. All are well maintained. The staff (Faizal) is very cheerful and warm-welcoming. Security level is 9 out of 10 (room lock using passwords-instead of card or key). It was worth every dime. I recommended this to anyone.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Bad experience as private room can't lock from outside. Lock from inside the lock only can lock thru latch. Even though private room is located inside a main room which required guest to key in access code to gain into each private rooms. However, feels insecure when not in the room as other guests that shares the same main room can gain access to other private rooms.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you to Peggy and LG for your great service and clean establishment. I really enjoyed my stay, lots of food stalls and convenience stores close by. Had a wonderful night sleep. Would definitely recommend your service.Kind regards John
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I never actually met the people who run this hostel because I checked in very late and checked out early (reception goes from morning till early evening). But all the instructions that were left for me by Tommy and Peggy were very clear on how to check in, and how to check out. The hostel is very clean, comfortable, and as I was there at night only I can say it's very quiet. Right across the road are some decent all-night places to eat, ATMs and convenience stores are very close, and it's only a seven minute walk to Lavender MTR, from which you can easily get to the airport (about a 30 minute train ride).Overall I'm glad I chose Blanc Inn and if I'm passing through Singapore again I'll probably book a room here.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
