review_body: โฮสเทลอยู่ใกล้กับmrt Lavender เดินทางสะดวกดีค่ะ บริเวณmrtกับที่พักมีร้านอาหารกับของกินเยอะ ไม่อดแน่นอนค่ะ ที่พักเราพักกับเพื่อนห้องห้าคนห้องไม่เล็กไม่ใหญ่เกินไป มีเตียงคู่1เตียง เตียงเดี่ยว3เตียง ในห้องมีทั้งแอร์และพัดลม(แอร์อยู่ฝั่งเตียงเดียว ฝั่งเตียงคู่เป็นพัดลม ไม่ต้องห่วงนะคะ ไม่ร้อน นอนสบาย) ห้องพักเราอยู่ชั้นสอง ห้องน้ำเป็นห้องน้ำรวมอยู่ชั้นหนึ่งสะดวกมาก มีสบู่ แชมพู ยาสีฟัน ไดร์เป่าผมให้ค่ะ ใครมาสิงคโปร์มาพักที่นี่ได้เลยค่ะ ไม่ผิดหวังแน่นอนThe Hostel is near MRT Lavender.There are many food and restaurants around MRT and the hostel.(Don't worry ,You won't starve XD) I stayed in 5 persons room-family room with my friends.The room isn't big but very comfortable.There are a couple bed and 3 single beds.This room is on second floor but the toilets are on first floor.In the toilet , there are soap , shampoo , toothpaste and hair dryer.It is very convenient.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have never tried a hostel/inn with shared public washrooms. Hence, am a bit nervous when my friends chose this inn. But, turn out it was not that bad at all. Well, it is quite unique. The room only has curtain and rolling plastic door. The upper part of the wall is left open to keep the whole rooms get some air. Our room is at second floor. It consists of three beds in two cubicles. The bed is quite small but comfy, the linen sheet is clean, so does the pillow and blanket. Our cubicle has no AC, just ceiling fan, but the other cubicle has one. Hence, it is cool enough. Shoes are not allowed in the room. The shared washroom is quite neat and very clean. They provide towel as well for 1 singd. For ladies, the shower room at the back give more privacy. One can get drink water at the pantry. The upper deck living room is pretty too. The inn is easly reached from lavender station.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a great service from Faizal to me and my partnet. Very kind and helpful. The place also nice. Not noisy and comfort. The mini lounge was very nice compared to other sam class hostels. Surely will visit again on the next trip.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: a great place for backpackers. The staffs are friendly (especially the Chinese uncle, very friendly) comfortable alcove room (its very, very cozy!). Should you forget or do not have toiletries item like toothpaste, shower gel or hair shampoo. This inn have them prepared and ready for use. Clean bathroom. high speed wi-fi. Convenient location, only a few minute of walking to the Lavender MRT station.
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If ure looking for budget lodging in singapore.. this would be the place. Hostel concept but feels like a hotel. Nice private and cozy alcoves. The air conditioning is good, very clean and lots of facilities such as a safe, water dispenser, free coffee and tea. For people travelling by flight.. forget the body wash, shampoo and toothpaste. They provide it. Friendly staffs, convenient location near to mrt (walking distance) and convenient store. Plus free luggage storage. You can even take a shower after check out when you taking your bags. Would go there again next time in singapore. Cheap, hotel feeling in a hostel, recommend it!! Thumbs up
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this is a very basic (though somehow een stylish) place to stay at (2 nights...), but very reasonably priced and with light luggage (= short stay) a good choice! nice breakfast places around, touristic hot spots easy to reach... would come back, whenever travelling alone!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you, Faizal ! Your kindness made us happy , good time in Singapore . Early check -in healed our body and really refreshed . Good air conditioned cozy room , we will stay this hotel next time in Singapore again !!
hotelName:
28    Blanc Inn
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice and clean rooms. Centrally located and courteous staffs. However other amenities such as in room dining with limited food choices & available only till 11 PM really hinders if you come late to the room from sight seeing. I am being vegetarian the buffet breakfast did not have much choices to choose from unless I am content with bread toast. No fresh juices or fruits (except watermelon was fresh & other fruits like honeydew , melon etc are frozen). Except the food part i like everything else about this hotel. Robot comes to room deliver water bottles which is cool to see. There is a mall right next door to this hotel which is literally few feet away. Since centrally located getting on a taxi is never a hassle.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here because friends recommended it and I was blown away. Everything was wonderful about this hotel: decor, service, location. I really liked the pool and the views from the pool area. I booked a room that included access to the club lounge and that package was definitely worth it. I would stay again.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recently got back from staying here. Reception are very welcoming and friendly and the gift we got for staying at the hotel for honeymoon was lovely and thoughtful. The room was clean but smaller than expected. It did have all the necessity's; hairdryer, iron, fridge and each day we got complimentary water. The breakfast here was ok i found the staff and the chefs quite rude however and when drinks ran out they had to be prompted to refill which i didnt think was great.The location of this hotel is good being on top of the somerset station so access to most areas is really simple. I would stay again
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We scoured a lot of hotels around town before settling on Hotel Jen Gateway.. and boy, what a find! Right smack in the middle of Orchard Road, subway at your doorstep, freaking amazing rooftop pool, fantastic staff, great bar (Prive!), restaurants, malls and even the cinema literally steps away. Room was not the biggest but certainly not the smallest - unless of course you are the sort who needs lots of space from your travelling companion. Our room #1622 had a lovely little reading nook by the window, and we spent mornings just laying there drinking coffee and enjoying the views of the concrete jungle. One late night we asked for cutleries and Robot Jeno delivered it!! Couldn't be more cuter! Vending machine sells cup noodles, Panadol and even condoms - perfect for those moments when you need the essentials and can't be bothered to dress up to head downstairs. We are DEFINITELY coming back!! Thank you Hotel Jen, for making our birthday weekend a blast!
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had four nights at the hotel. We were a family of five and had three rooms. All rooms were perfect and well appointed. The pool is spectacular, especially with a cocktail bar attached. The service was amazing. I fell sick and needed to see a doctor. The staff helped me locate a walk-in centre and when I returned to our room that afternoon, the staff had left me a beautiful fresh fruit salad in the fridge. I've never had that sort of service in any hotel around the world.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff at hotel Jen are great and it’s in a fantastic location. The pool would be lovely if it looked like the photo accompanying this trip advisor site, however it’s very very busy and disappointing. The rooms are pretty small too. We had a clubroom which was well worth the extra paid, and the breakfast spread was excellent in the main dining area
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great Hotel. Really great staff. Two sets of lifts, one set leads to lobby on 10th floor, and the other set from entrance of main restaurant(also om 10th floor) to mall levels and basement level directly to the MTR. Nice pool area and decks, and on other side there is a gym and another viewing deck where yoga classes are held sometimes. Great views from club lounge. Singaporeans are honest and don't do you down around the city.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel made our stay in Singapore memorable and exceptional!CHECK-IN - lobby was huge by the 10th floor. It was smooth and front desk were attentive.ROOM - the decor was ok, but smells fresh and well-cleaned. Linens were white and clean. The safe was in perfect condition. The hallways were spotless and smells good too.POOL - was exceptionally amazing. Super clean, attentive staff, nice music, overlooking the Marina Sands Bay. The bathroom was equipped with fancy showers and toiletries. It is super clean too,LOCATION - it was in the heart of Orchard road because the train station is just an elevator away and the mall is literally just below the hotel too. FOOD - the buffet breakfast although not complimentary but it was worth it. It has indonesian, chinese, japanese, englisdh, american and french cuisine. We were just planning to to do it first day but ended up availing all throughout our stay.We will go back to this hotel again! By the way, try their robot service named JENNO to deliver your cookies in your room, it's only 5SGD , my kids loved him that we had to do it again.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 3 nights here it was quite convenient below is the nice 313 mall and has mrt as well. Can get plenty of food choices and shopping as well. The check in and check out process was quick. The room was clean and modern. Quite enjoyed the overall stay and location convenience. Would stay here again.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was in Singapore for a weekend break and it was my first stay at Hotel Jen, It will most certainly NOT be the last! - A great experience! The location of the hotel is perfect. If you have not been to Singapore before, you could not pick a better location. The hotel is attached to a mall, which also is attached to the MRT station, so getting around Singapore could not be easier You are smack in the middle of Orchard Street with endless choices of restaurants, bars and some of Singapore’s best shopping. Now let’s talk about the hotel itself; every aspect of it was awesome, quirky, fun and it had all the right service touch points without being overly fussy. The roof top infinity pool is an Oasis in the middle of downtown Singapore. The views of the Singapore skyline are amazing and it is the perfect place to watch the sunset while having a cocktail or two! Breakfast was superb and the variety was outstanding. The hotel has a robot named Jeno who delivers your In-Room Dining – How cool is that!!! – My girlfriend wanted to take him home, but unfortunately, he had to return to work after he politely dropped off our order and asked us if we were enjoying our stay! Overall, a great experience and a very well managed hotel. Every single member of staff we interacted with was extremely friendly and courteous – We will definitely be back!
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were pleasantly surprised by the hotel Jen Orchardgateway; even though we only stayed there for one night on the way back home to Helsinki. The place is centrally located on Orchard Road (actually Somerset but you can access Orchard through the mall) and is ideal for tourists or business people with meetings around Ngee Ann city or the western part of the city. The rooms are spacious and we enjoyed having a great view up Orchard Road. Food is also a highlight; the breakfast buffet is massive and while we didn’t get a chance to go, the lounge bar looks lovely as well.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel always fullfill our needs for every stay. Room cleaniness is always top notch. Adequate amenities throughout our stays. The pool is the gem of the hotels and cater for family. Breakfast was superb with great varieties from local to western. The chef able to deliver special request for my son diet. Jeno is the my children favorite. Is a good surprise for my kids to send the goodies to them and they love it.Kudos to front office staff for the smooth check in and check out and arranging the surprise for my kids.Thanks to Adrian Front Office Manager for arranging the special request for my stay.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just completed 6 night stay at the fab Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway - we are return visitors (this was either our 5th or 6th stay). Fantastic location, friendly staff, lovely room and great breakfast food in the Makan restaurant. This hotel never disappoints and is consistently superior in terms of the service it provides. Lovely to see familiar faces among the staff who all go out of their way to make your stay at the Jen memorable. Special mentions to be made here of Mavis, Stella and Catherine in the Makan who all excel at customer service. Look forward to our next visit.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a great time spent at the hotel Staff was fantastic and friendly, great view of the pool and the bar at the lounge and baywatch.there one staff who amazes me Sean from baywatch,His service is fantastic and friendly the cocktails he prepared is lovely.will intro my friends and family about the hotel.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location.breakfast and seafood buffet was amazing. Highlight was ice cream station wow.Only fault is the rooms are small. Booked x 2 superior rooms and glad I only had family in my room because bathroom has no privacy.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Being just above Somerset station, and with direct lift access to Orchardgateway shopping centre, the location is great whether for shopping or to sight-see around Singapore.The rooms were decent sized, with the amenities good, although for some reason the bed wasn't the most comfortable (perhaps the mattress topper was the problem, as it felt as if something was not quite right). Towel airing rails instead of hooks would also be good.The breakfast was good, with excellent variety, ranging from the bacon and eggs, to local specialties and continental style cold cuts, which changed daily; as we were there for 5 days, it made a difference not having the same breakfast everyday.Staff were unfailingly friendly, but were not overbearing; great also not having a stuffy hotel. The roof-top pool had great views, and the surrounds was very pleasant for lounging around.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have been again at the Jen Orchardgatesway Hotel in Singapore. We are returning guests as we enjoy very much their rooftop infinity pool ,their panoramic view of Singapore and their great breakfast buffet.We would like to give special thanks to Chef Sam and Mavis Kiong from the breakfast buffet who always go the extra mile as tourist advisors .They are very good ambassadors of the Hotel and Singapore. We had a great time .The Rothmann's
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel as it was one of the few that had an affordable family room if decent size. Our twins slept on a double sofa bed and we had a king. We luckily had a corner room with views out to Marina Bay Sands in the distance. It’s also in a convenient location above a large shopping mall. The rooftop pool is fantastic with 260 degree views over the city. The breakfast was good with a wide variety of food and friendly staff.We were also impressed with the service. My daughter had a huge splinter in her foot and we asked reception if they could give us a needle to dig it out. The duty manager, Sylvester came up to our room with a first aid kit. He suggested we take her to a clinic as the splinter was so deep but we insisted on trying ourselves. Between my husband, Sylvester and myself it took nearly an hr. He was so patient and we finally got all of it out. He then organised for Jeno, the robot to come up to the room with chocolates for both my twins which was very exciting for them. There was even a special typed message for my daughter to help cheer her up. These are the small touches that you remember about a hotel. Well done.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing Hotel, pool fantastic with breathtaking views. MRT right underneath hotel which makes getting anywhere easy. Shops galore and plenty of food to choose from so location was perfect. We added on club room access and really enjoyed it being a bit quieter for breakfast and night time beverages, special mention to Jing Hao who made our stay more enjoyable with his advice on sightseeing tips and making us feel welcome. We really enjoyed our stay and will be definately staying with you again next visit.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Jen Orchard Gateway for two nights as the final leg of our 2 week holiday. We chose it both on personal recommendation and after checking out the reviews here. It did not disappoint at all. We decided to upgrade to Club on arrival, the cost of which was very reasonable and both the service and breakfasts we enjoyed during our stay in the Club Lounge were faultless. Importantly for us it also had comfortably the largest, cleanest and best disabled toilet that I have ever seen (honestly, it was a thing of wonder!). Yes, it is a big city centre hotel and yes, it is part of a global hospitality chain, but the approach of the guest service team from Reception to Lounge to Bar was a tribute to the management who have contrived to create a lovely, relaxed ambience and ensure that this gleaming 20-storey tower of glass and steel has a soul (as well as the most eyecatching of rooftop pools). Every element of our stay from check in to departure was handled with smiling efficiency and genuine warmth. We ate in the 10th floor restaurant on arrival as it was late and we were tired from our journey, although the very helpful receptionist had suggested we went to the Mall next door for its massive Food Court. The restaurant food was very well cooked international fare, which after 7 days of admittedly lovely Indonesian dishes was just what we needed. The poolside bar with its jawdropping Gotham City views was a great place to enjoy a nightcap and one of our party used the bamboo-enclosed gym and said it too was excellent. The location could not be better for MRT access, and even we confirmed non-shoppers were tempted by the well designed mall beneath the hotel; Uniqlo especially proved a hit. Finally, just the other side of Orchard Rd, directly across from the hotel I would recommend a visit to the oasis of Emerald Hill Rd, colourful and photogenic colonial architecture and a scattering of welcoming bars and cafes. Our favourite escape was to sit at a corner table outside the Alley Bar with a Tiger Beer to watch the world go by.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I expected this hotel would gave me a good room experience like I had with the hotel Jen in China with the group of Shangri-La hotel. Great location but The room is super small, thin wall. I can hear other people in the next room talking. Even mobile phone ringing. I can feel it though my room. The staffs are nice and friendly. My room is always clean. I’m not very happy with the wall. The gym is small but very nice pool. With this price, I would stay at another quiet for my next visit.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2 weeks for business. The best thing is that it is very close to MRT and food. The breakfast is great with variety. The room size is Okay too. They have nice swimming pool and the cute Jeno robot. If that’s not the housekeeping I would have given them at least 4 stars if not 5. However one big letdown is the housekeeping was pretty careless. Once they forgot to give me bottle water, the other day they forgot to give me toiletries (and then they gave me a few pieces more on the next day...), there’s also days that they missed 1-2 towels here and there. I also had one incident that they packed my travel buddy on the bed with dirty bedsheets and sent to laundry... luckily I discovered that before it was too late. I am not sure how they can miss a black 15cm travel buddy on white bedsheets. The service manager was very nice and keep apologising though. I am still debating on whether I should book the hotel for my next travel in a few weeks’ time.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely fabulous. Could not fault the staff or the property. From the moment we arrived until hours AFTER checkout (yes after checkout, we were told we could make use of ALL facilities until our 11:50pm flight home, including being able to shower before our flight) the staff were welcoming and friendly. The breakfast in the club lounge was fantastic, from pancakes, bacon, eggs (however you wanted them prepared), pastries, cereals, meats, cheeses and Asian dishes, it was plentiful and fresh. The pool was voted coolest pool 2018 and I can see why, infinity edge over looking the magnificent Singapore skyline and Marina Bay Sands. Literally steps away from the MRT, hop on hop off bus stop and connected to Orchard a Central and Orchard Gateway shopping centres. The bed was super comfortable (I’m very fussy), fresh clean rooms, 4 bottles of water daily in the fridge. Would not hesitate booking a Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway again and would recommend to family and friends. The highlight for my daughter was JenO (the hotel’s resident robot) she was absolutely delighted when he came to our room with a surprise after checkin. Thank you for a great stay! The only thing I can criticise is the lack of attention on the lifeguard who was manning the pool on a Friday night. He spent more time playing on his phone than he did watching the pool. I’d say he’d look up from his phone every 5-10 minutes for 5 seconds perhaps before going back to his phone.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at the Jen for a few days and it was a great experience. The hotel and rooms are recent and comfortable, location is great, dining options are plenty if you take the adjacent mall into account. You can really lap in the pool, but the gym is small with only one elliptical.This is a very convenient business hotel, with great service and most of what you would find at more expensive venues.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recently stayed at this hotel and had a great time.The room was spacious, we weren’t sure about the bathroom arrangement at first but it worked fine. If the sliding door went further across the room I think that would be better for privacy.The beds were very comfortable and the shower was really good, the toiletries were topped up every day which was nice.There was lots of storage in the room which was good.The infinity pool was fantastic, the temperature of the pool was just right and the view was amazing. There is also a bar up there with very friendly staff.The location is fantastic, above a train station called Somerset and a shopping centre. There are also lots and lots of eating places in the surrounding area and it is very busy at all times of the day and night so the hotel was a lovely respite to all the qction downstairs.Would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: amazing swimming pool with a perfect view over the city.Excellent food, a lot of tasty choices.Clean and comfortable room.strategic position with a lot of shops nearby.I did not like that the swimming pool was very noisy, with a lot of small children yelling and splashing in the main pool, not in the children one. The staff did nothing about it, even after complaints. also, when another guest took one of our lounge chairs, that had our towel on it, and it refused to go away causing a scene, the pool stuff did nothing about it, which was very unprofessional.also, it was a pity that the pool closed early in the evening, when the view is stunning and the atmosphere was more peaceful
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is clean, well kept and in a good location for public transportation. The rooftop pool and lounging area is also enjoyable. My partner and I did encounter some noise issues which really took away from the hotels enjoyment. On our second day, there was constant banging and drilling above us throughout the day. At night, a nearby room was blasting a television throughout the night and early morning hours along with loud conversation which interrupted our sleep. We were moved into another room the next morning, however, this room had noise issues of its own. A crying toddler could be heard as of this moment, and the noise is once again traveling into our room preventing us from sleeping.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for three nights at this hotel and we enjoyed the good service, the view from the room, the working wi-fi and especially the pool area. It is well located along Orchard Road and on top of the metro station Somerset, which makes it very easy to get virtually anywhere. The price for value, as Singapore is rather expensive, is exceptionally good and we would most likely come again. Close to the area the are a couple of good food courts, one of which is located in the shopping mall below the hotel at the fifth floor (Food Republic) and the second one on the ground floor of the Takashimaya Shopping Centre in Orchard Road.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel - clean nice staff , directly above Somerset MRT station which is perfect Aircon is great we had a king deluxe suite shower was a little hard to navigate (shower over bath) but overall a great experience.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The pool is the best feature about this hotel and it’s location is also good if you need orchard rs and positioned above the MRT makes it easy to get around However we didn’t love our stay - our I’m needed the beds adjusted so we went out for three hours and were told our suitcases would be in our room and bed done Come back to no suitcases delivered and the beds had not even been corrected - hopeless !The breakfast is expensive for what it is - not great value at all !The rooms are bland and have no personality and I don’t like the staff casual uniform! It’s probably meant to look casual and young or something but it misses the mark - no denim!We wouldn’t stay here again - it was not value for money at all
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel. Well situated. Clean and comfortable rooms with lovely views over the city skyline.Excellent, friendly and helpful staff throughout and a special mention to staff member Mavis Kiong who was always friendly and most efficient in her service. Thank you to all.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were recommended this hotel by friends due to the location ( right above an MRT) and it’s pool. It was great!For us the biggest selling point was the location - being above Somerset station. When I say above - the hotel is above a shopping mall which the MRT is located under. So you get your normal lift from your room to reception and then walk round the corner to another set of lifts that take you to the mall or MRT. We found the MRT soo easy to use and purchased a 3 day travel card each which we would recommend. The pool was lovely albeit busy at times. The view of Singapore was magical and the sky at sunset is not one to miss. We only spent one afternoon here as we wanted to see Singapore as much as possible. So my recommendation is to stay here if you have some downtime to actually use the facilities. Otherwise your just paying a premium for a standard hotel. What I mean byThat is the hotel is nice but the rooms are standard rooms and it’s the pool and facilities that make it stand your so you want to make sure they get used ! I did notice the noise from the corridor at times and other rooms with loud tv’s but I guess that can always happen. So pleasant rooms but nothing out of this world ( except view see picture ) We didn’t opt for the breakfast to be included as did seem expensive. Also it’s another opportunity to see more of Singapore which offers great brunch restaurants. Although Singapore is expensive. Where we were having lunch around 11 am we then didn’t eat lunch so it did benefit us. In summary , we’d recommend this hotel on this basis you get some downtime to use the pool, gym or yoga classes as this is what makes it stand out and worth the money. Enjoy !
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As loyal Shangri La Golden Circle members we thought we would try this property, perfectly located on Orchard Road - directly above an MRT station!We booked a Club room so we could enjoy daily breakfasts and afternoon drinks.Overall, the room was fine for our needs... top floor with great views down Orchard Road.But the real appeal of this hotel is the fantastic rooftop pool! Plenty of room for both couples and families to spread out, and not nearly as noisy or busy as Marina Bay Sands famous rooftop pool! Plus the easy access to the bar is great too.The one negative point for Management to consider - all of the breakfast food in the buffets, both on the 10th floor restaurant and the Club Room - was always cold. Need to ensure food is hot!
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall this was a very nice place to stay. The staff were helpful. The pool was great for relaxing after a day of exploring. The pool had different levels to accommodate children and adults. The room was smaller than expected but doable for the two of us.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I tend to expect great service from Asian hotels. Hotel Jen really exceeded my expectations. The service is so kind and genuine. We felt so comfortable there. After a very long travel day we arrived at the hotel. A general manager was on the sidewalk helping with luggage. I wish I could remember his name. He set the standard for all staff members. One piece of luggage arrive with a broken handle. When the case arrived at our room it had been repaired. Where else would this be done?The location is great. The pool amazing. The room amazing.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel based on the gorgeous pictures I'd seen of the pool and it was indeed lovely. The rest of the hotel was not for us. The rooms were tiny and very Accor/Novotel budget style, they are going to date pretty quickly, and we didn't feel that they were worth $400 AUD per night which is approx. what we paid for the entry level room with breakfast.Some staff were helpful, the uniforms were very sloppy, red sneakers and jeans, the casual clothes seem to match the overtly casual vibe of the hotel, we'd probably thought this was a good product at around $195...again we realise the great pool adds a lot to the package...but if it's raining, then you are left with a motel room at the end of they day !One final thing, the air conditioning was absolutely ridiculously cold. You had to wear winter clothes to walk down the corridors. A horrible feeling in a lovely tropical climate. To be fair this was also the case with all the shopping centres in Orchard rd. I didn't enjoy having to put a jacket on to go into the shops and then a singlet top outside. What a waste of electricity to make it that cold. It was not pleasantly cooler than outside, it was freezing. We would not stay again based on this visit.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Directly above Somerset train station (no you can't hear the trains) in a fantastic location on Orchard rd. Travelled by myself, room size would have been fine for two people. Very modern and clean room, free ice and snack machines on each floor. Pool was excellent and very clean. Hotel is ontop of shopping center and there are many options to eat drink, catching a lift from shopping center to hotel can be confusing, take note of where you caught lift. Easy to access from Changi airport via SMRT, was my first time on train and it was very easy. Stayed here 4 nights and then went to MBS for 1 night. This hotel is much much better than MBS and the pool is better. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Jen Orchardgateway at the beginning of April for a 4 night stay. This was the first stop for us on our honeymoon. As we arrived we were upgraded to a deluxe room and we paid an additional $70 to take advantage of the hotels club lounge. The deluxe rooms were huge with lots of storage space and very comfortable king size beds. The club lounge allowed us to take a great breakfast in the quieter club lounge on the 19th floor where there was plenty of breakfast options for travelers from all over the world and views over Singapore and Orchard rd. We also enjoyed the 5-7pm drinks and snacks which were included the the package. The hotels swimming pool is a huge selling point with incredible views over the stunning Singapore skyline. Great for chilling out after a busy day of sightseeing and the pool bar cocktails were great too. The hotel is located in the heart of Orchard road and directly above the MRT so the rest of Singapore is within easy reach either by foot or by MRT. The hotel staff were always helpful and polite and the service in the hotel bar was great. The hotel even left us a bottle of wine in the room for a Honeymoon treat!This is a brilliant hotel for both pleasure and business travelers and if we get to visit Singapore again I wouldn't hesitate to book this hotel.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for three days on the return to home leg of a two-week trip to Japan.I couldn’t justify over $1,000 a night at Marina Bay Sands but discovered this gem for $500.What a fantastic roof top pool, with direct views to the Marina Bay area and surrounding city.The kids loved ordering room service, being delivered to the room by Jeno, the Hotel’s robot - quirky but cool.I’d stay here again for sure
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is Perfect. Right in the middle of orchard road shopping district. Hotel lobby on 10th floor has direct access to the Mall, bridge on 3rd floor to cross street or basement access to Centerpoint shopping complex and Somerset station of the MRT. Japan stores uniqlo, Donki and Tokyu Hands in the building. Next door 313 Somerset there is a food hall in basement 2 and food republic food court on the 5th floor. Very close to Tang’s. Head to Lucky plaza for better money change rates. Very good food hall and cold storage supermarket at Takashimaya next door or Marketplace at Robinson’s. Breakfast spread is typical but repeats menu. Room tidy ness needs improvement.

review_body: Fantastic hotel with mostly great staffOnly issues with the whole week was housekeeping who consistently forgot face washers etcThe location is 111/10 simply the best in Singapore Walking to anywhere is easy and fast

review_body: If you want the shortest and the best reason to go - just go for the rooftop infinity pool. You can be there all day long and witness the changing hues of skyBesides the pool there are other reasons too but do you care
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, great pool and great staff. Once again, Jen lived up to my expectations. I would certainly recommend a club room. I t was my first time at the Jen in Singapore but it won't be my last. We paid for a sea view room and it was worth the extra.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I previously stayed twice at Hotel Jen Tanglin before, and gave that hotel a 4/5. But Hotel Jen Orchardgateway is a clear step-up from Tanglin in every way:- the location is just perfect, right in Somerset above the MRT. Tons of restaurants, bars and others around- the room windows do not have the weird orange tint that the ones in Tanglin have- the pool here is very nice (even though I did not have time to use it alas)- room is great - quiet, plenty of electrical sockets, and the size is above average in Singapore- their bar is nearly empty, which I actually love! Makes it convenient to have quiet drinks with people thereSome negatives:- twice, there was only one concierge there, and it took forever to get to him as there were many people waiting for him. Honestly, there needs to be 2 concierge at all times, especially during the daytime- maybe the reason why the bar is empty is because the drinks menu is rather limited...- at first glance, reception looks more like Holiday Inn Express than a 4-star hotel. But once you get over the decor, it was perfectly serviceable.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Chose this hotel due to it's location and the pool are and we were not disappointed. Perfect location close to the MRT so we could easily get around the city without using taxis. The pool area is just what you need after a long day in SIN, or as a quick refresher before exploring SIN. The only thing I would "warn" others about, is the bathroom, it has an open solution with frosted walls between the toilet, the shower and the rest of the room. So if you'd like some privacy when using the bathroom, this is not the place. You sort of step right into the room from the shower, so you should really know the person you're sharing the room with.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Hotel so nice, it is in the best location in Orchard which is also connected to orchardgateway shopping center. the room was so nice and specious. I loved the swimming pool area which has a great view to Marina Bay Sand.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located strategically in heart of Somerset MRT, one have direct access to various malls and food options. The hotel lobby is bright and rooms are clean and specious. Enjoy your meals at their restaurant with an outdoor open deck that provide you a cool shaded area to chill. Overall enjoyed my stay tremendously.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent 5 nights here. Let me check in early. All staff very nice and helpful. The rooftop pool is absolutely awesome. Loved Jen the robot. Also loved that hotel elevator goes directly to mrt. Had a great view(18th) floor of marina bay sands.Rooms small, but that is probably the norm. Great set up. Kodoos to the room cleaners. Very friendly. Loved decor, lounge beautiful, the outdoor area with living wall was gorgeous. Though it was always empty. Centrally located. Would stay here again.Liz
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been travelling to Singapore for work and Hotel Jen is where I stay all the time. This hotel has everything you need for a good trip to Singapore - whether for work or pleasure. It's centrally located amongst Singapore's premier shopping district, has an abundance of transport options with a bus station outside, the underground, and taxis for anything you can't walk to. The breakfast buffet is great, varied, and competes with the likes of that offered by top-end Hiltons in locations like Sydney or Bangkok. Swimming in the rooftop pool amidst the city centre with thousands of lights at nightime, and a direct view to Marina Bay Sands is a great way to finish an evening. If you get to the free Thursday night yoga class, let me know how it is - I've never managed to get there yet as I'm normally at one of the hundreds of bars and restaurants in the local area. What makes Jen special is the team - they're great, welcoming, friendly and accommodating.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's almost a mini marina bay sands hotels as it also has a rooftop pool with views across the city - just not on the same scale!We had four nights here on the way back from a holiday in Langkawi. At first the size of the room was a bit of a shock, considering what we used to in Langkawi but you get what you pay for and in Singapore, you're not in the room much! Also, the bathroom was an open design but enclosed toilet, so if this doesn't appeal, you may opt for a larger, but more expensive room.Having said that, the room was comfortable, clean and well kept. Also very quiet with nice views. We could see the MBS from our room.The hotel location is excellent. Right above a shopping centre and Somerset MRT and on Orchard Road. We never ate at the hotel because there are so many eating options around the hotel. I can highly recommend Din Tai Fung at the Centrepoint Mall, level 2 for an authentic experience that's not expensive, and just across the road from the hotel.Definitely recommended.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a week this month and it was superb throughout.Staff were all very friendly, helpful and did a wonderful job.The facilities were modern and clean throughout, the rooftop pool & terrace area are a delight.Our room was very clean and modern with a comfy bed and great shower and was kept wonderfully clean by the housekeepers.Food was brilliant also, a great breakfast buffet served, with something for everyone irrespective of where in the world you’re from. Didn’t eat anything else bar some room service meals, though this was very nice also and had quite a surprise when a robot came and delivered it to our room!Great location also, Orchard Rd on one side and Somerset Metro station on the other which could whisk you downtown in no time.Can’t fault this place. If I come back to Singapore I’ll look to stay here and I’ll encourage anyone I know who is looking to head there, to check this place out also.Thank you for a lovely stay.
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everyone in the hotel was really friendly & helpful, especially Mavis Kiong :) Amazing views from the rooftop pool.Great place to explore from as it’s directly above a tube station, not that you would know. Places to eat in shopping centre below too. Lovely room.We ordered a bath robe and it arrived by robot!If you are due to arrive early remember to ask your travel agent about sorting an early check in Fantastic place, cannot wait to go back :)
hotelName:
29    Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore by Shangri-La
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our 3 night stay here. We paid a little extra for a club room and it was well worth it - the club lounge Has great views, soft drinks during the day and a very nice chilling time with wine, beer and snacks between 5.30 and 7.30 which saves a lot of money given the wine prices in Singapore). The staff in the lounge were excellent and we were able to use the facilities on the last day after checkout when we had a late flight.The Pool area is fabulous with amazing views of the city and the marina bay sands. It was a great place to relax after sightseeing in the 35 degree heat.

review_body: Very good hotel. Staff helpful. They have a robot which does room service. Roof top pool lovely, unfortunately closed with Thunder storms the night we had a late flight out. Close to shopping in Orchard Rd.
